2a1('bum): stong phrag brgyad las/ dum bu bcubazhipa/ bam pa dang pa
2a2('bum): stong phrag brgyad las/ dum bu bcu bzhi pa/ bam po dang por// 
2a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ skang dun kyi sa nirnam par reg pa
2a4('bum): roms kya dbyangs gau na
2a5('bum): mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ zugs las gud na yang chos
2a6('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// ches kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// 
2b1('bum): tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tsher ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
2b2('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// / 'du shes kyang ches kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na
2b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang ches kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 
2b4('bum): 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi
3a1('bum): dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa
3a2('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// 
3a3('bum): myig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myi dag las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig nyid kyang ches kyi dbyings so// 
3a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig ge// rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang
3a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna yang ches kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
3b1('bum): sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lci yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
3b2('bum): lce nyid kyang ches kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
3b3('bum): lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma la gras/ yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
3b4('bum): mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs rgya nga chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las
3b5('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
3b6('bum): sgra las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
4a1('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ blo nyid kyang chos kya dbyangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro yang rgyas kyi dbyings ma
4a2('bum): lags te ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
4a3('bum): reg las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nganyid kyang reg go// chos kyang chos kyang chos kyi
4a4('bum): dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na yang chos kyidabyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos nyid do// myig gi
4a5('bum): rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ myig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
4a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lagasarna ba'i
4a7('bum): rna pa'i rna par shes pa las su yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
4b1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi
4b2('bum): dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mches te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
4b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings
4b4('bum): mA lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchisate/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
4b5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang / chos
4b6('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las/ gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus
5a1('bum): kyin pa d+ma shes kyi chos kyi dbyu so// chos kyi sa u ma bya shes / da kyi ma shes pas
5a2('bum): kyi dbyings po lagaso yid kyi rnam par shes pa ltas gu yang chos kyi dbyings mchis te/ da kyi rnam pa nas kyang rgyas kyi phyi mas// 
5a3('bum): sa nga dus ga las ku na sa kyi byings ma mchis te/ 'i 'dus te rig pa nyi kyang chos kyi day-i so// 
5a4('bum): rnanga'i tshus te reg pa mas su na sa chos kyi phyis
5b1('bum): mchis te lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings mi log
5b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg
5b3('bum): pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings mA la gas yid kyi 'das te ri go pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te rog pa nyid kyang
5b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi'adus te re ga pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
5b5('bum): myig gi'o dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las gud na ya dra ches kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dusarig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
5b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsho roba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
5b7('bum): rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang ches kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid gang rnam
6a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'os gung na srung chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 
6a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings/ 
6a3('bum): nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bo las
6a4('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
6a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ra ba las gud na yang / 
6a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis char/ 
6a7('bum): ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid yang ches kyi dbyings ma lag sa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor baM las gud na yang / chos kyi
6b1('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khaMs
6b2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams
6b3('bum): sr-i/ chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings mA lags chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
6b4('bum): nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khrims nyid kyang cho sa kyi dbyings ma legs/ me'i khams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang
6b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khe mas so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma la gas/ rlung gi khams las gung ni yang chos kyi dbyings
6b6('bum): ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam
6b7('bum): nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// 
7a1('bum): rnam par shes bya'i khamasna kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam
7a2('bum): par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kya rnam par shes pa'i khams so// rtswa rig rdzas nga nas ky-i dbyings ma lags
7a3('bum): ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyi dbyings so// rmo sa kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig// 
7a4('bum): 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings mAM logs/ 'du byed las gud na yang ngo chos kyi dbyings ma ma ches te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos
7a5('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi byings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ltas
7a6('bum): gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang / 
7a7('bum): gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mying dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang ches
7b1('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las
7b2('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug/ ga
7b3('bum): ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
7b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma logs/ ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
7b5('bum): mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
7b6('bum): sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
8a1('bum): len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 
8a2('bum): pasrid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang
8a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma logs/ rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
8a4('bum): rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang / da rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbye/ ngas ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang
8a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
8a6('bum): pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
8a7('bum): nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i
8a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi
8b1('bum): mang du phyin pa las gung na ya rgyas kyi byi ma ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyis nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pa 'omang tu phyin pa'o// 
8b2('bum): gangan po pa'i 'ang tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gi pha ro lang tu ni pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis to bsam gtan gi ba'i yang du sbyin pa chos kyi
8b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid bying bsam gtan gi ba ro mang du na dpa'o// shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las gud namang chos kyi dbyings ma ma
8b4('bum): shes rab kyi 'o mang phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong ba
8b5('bum): gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// te phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid
8b6('bum): gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// nang stong po nyid chos kyi dbyis sa legs/ phyin stong pa nyid mas
8b7('bum): na yang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid de// snying pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid
8b8('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid // chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma 'd-i/ 
9a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi byis/ 
9a2('bum): pha ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
9a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gudo na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus
9a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te'adus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
9a5('bum): kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las/ 
9a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyingos nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lag/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
9a7('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
9a8('bum): dbyings ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
9b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 
9b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
9b3('bum): kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
9b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ngas ma lags/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi
9b5('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi// dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa// stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
9b6('bum): lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyi ngas ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// 
9b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 
9b8('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
10a1('bum): krachos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi
10a2('bum): dbyings ma mchis te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
10a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis to/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par song ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gi ga / 
10a4('bum): ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
10a5('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnamasalas gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid/ 
10a6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags stobs rnams gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang
10a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
10a8('bum): ma mchis byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags lam las gud na yang chos
10b1('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam las gu
10b2('bum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lag/ 
10b3('bum): bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa rnams kyang
10b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings mi lagasate tshad med pa rnams las gud na ya nga chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnamaso/ 
10b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi nga/ byings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
10b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
10b7('bum): lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thard pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so/ mthar kyis
10b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings mi lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar kyis gnas pa
11a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// rgyas nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
11a2('bum): pha smon pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i/ 
11a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshon ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa
11a4('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnam das las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
11a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos
11a6('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs
11a7('bum): kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs las gud na/ 
11a8('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang
11b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// 
11b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
11b3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang
11b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje
11b5('bum): chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snyi nga rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
11b6('bum): rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
11b7('bum): 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun
11b8('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
12a1('bum): bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las
12a2('bum): pa/ gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
12a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
12a4('bum): rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying sa nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
12a5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyi/ de las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gi / rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
12a6('bum): nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa
12a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byorang de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
12a8('bum): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes
12b1('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
12b2('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
12b3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang snang ba'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings
12b4('bum): nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi
12b5('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang cho sa kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid
12b6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
12b7('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sa
12b8('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
13a1('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg
13a2('bum): pharna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te
13a3('bum): reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te
13a4('bum): reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ra ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus
13a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyidakyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg
13a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lcen
13a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
13a8('bum): kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams
13b1('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
13b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
13b3('bum): dbyings nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par
13b4('bum): shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi dngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched
13b5('bum): drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mad drug go// reg pa nyid chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying sa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
13b6('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
13b7('bum): sa kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
13b8('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
14a1('bum): bcod pa'i brlom dzin pa nyid chos kyi rgyam sa/ sa tu tshungs nyi tu nga pa'i cos tsun par/ bson 'grus kyi pa robang du byin pa nyid kyi chos kyi dbyis sa/ sa
14a2('bum): sa cid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi
14a3('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi ste
14a4('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa
14a5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa
14a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong/ 
14a7('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong / 
14a8('bum): pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyi
14b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
14b2('bum): kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
14b3('bum): nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
14b4('bum): kyang myi dmyigs stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
14b5('bum): dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag
14b6('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par
14b7('bum): spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po
14b8('bum): rnams so// stob nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
14b9('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings
15a1('bum): nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad ming pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so
15a2('bum): pha/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par
15a3('bum): tha ra pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
15a4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam pa ra tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kya
15a5('bum): rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa 'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ 
15a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
15a7('bum): stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so
15a8('bum): yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rjes kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byis pa chen po/ 
15b1('bum): snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos
15b2('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ 
15b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong po'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos
15b4('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// da rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang
15b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
15b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor dgal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chochos kyi dbyings lA ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong / 
15b7('bum): na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par yang myi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
15b8('bum): pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes na/ chos thams cad mying myed pa la mying gi bdar chos stond to// 'di ni gzugs shes bya'o// 'di tshor ba zhes bya'o// 
16a1('bum): 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig ces bya'o// 'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce zhes bya'o// 'di na
16a2('bum): pha lus zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid ces bya'o// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni dri zhes bya'o// 'di ni ri zhes bya'o// 'di ni rig ces bya'o// 'di ni chos shes bya'o// 'di ni myig gi rnam/ 
16a3('bum): par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni/ 
16a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 
16a5('bum): 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i/ rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
16a6('bum): kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
16a7('bum): ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya
16a8('bum): 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni/ 
16b1('bum): skye mched drug zhes bya'o// 'di ni reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni len pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rga shi zhes bya
16b2('bum): 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni
16b3('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa
16b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces rkang bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'du sa byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces
16b5('bum): bya'o// 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
16b6('bum): ces bya'o// 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po
16b7('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag parar spong ba rnams zhes/ 
16b8('bum): bya'o// 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i
17a1('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rdzas zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di
17a2('bum): dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ces bya'o// 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam
17a3('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnaMs zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs
17a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rna/ rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o// 
17a5('bum): 'di dag ni byams pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 
17a6('bum): 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang byang chub ces bya'o// 'di ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces/ 
17a7('bum): bya'o// 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhes stond to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgra ma byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ rdzas kyi rnam
17a8('bum): pi gyin zhig la brten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ ba ljang gi gzugs sam/ rnga mo 'am/ lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ 
17b1('bum): bud myed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ gzhal myed khang ngam/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal lam/ kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba 'am/ rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba 'am
17b2('bum): nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul te/ de dag tu stand dang / 'khor gi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa bting ste/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / spyan
17b3('bum): gzigs zhim po dag bstand tam/ glu dang / sil snyan gis skye bo dag dga' bar byas nas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am/ bzod pa bsgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus
17b4('bum): brtsam pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gis rnam par brtse zhing / she sa rab bsgom pa dang / rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas tergyal rigs che zhing mtha' ba'i rigs bstand tam
17b5('bum): bram ze'i che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs bstand tam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs bstan tam/ rgyal chen bzhi/ ke'i rigs kyi lha rnams bstand tamaHsum bcu rtsa gsum gi lnga
17b6('bum): rnams bstand ta ma/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstand ta ma/ dga' ldan gi lha rnams bstand tam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams ba sta nad tam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams bstand ta ma/ 
17b7('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs chen gi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams bstan
17b8('bum): tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstand ta ma/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams bsta nad tam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ dge' ba'i lha rnams bstand ta ma/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam
18a1('bum): 6/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstun tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan dam/ chung che'i lha rnams bstanang tam/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam
18a2('bum): pha/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi che ba'i lha rnams bstun tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstand tam gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bas nang tam
18a3('bum): 'og myin gi lha rnams bstand tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstand dam/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan
18a4('bum): tam 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams gzugs med pa rnams bstand tam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra pa
18a5('bum): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/ byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa na sa nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / 
18a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i phar lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / 
18a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyong pa
18a8('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
18b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyig
18b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par
18b3('bum): spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
18b4('bum): lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 
18b5('bum): sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 
18b6('bum): dang / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs
18b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / 'jig rten gi khams rnas
18b8('bum): snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / spyod par dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
19a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas
19a2('bum): pa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dag bstan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/ 
19a3('bum): de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslab pa ngo mtshar che'o// re mdzes pa dag byed/ de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing / gzugs kyi bye brag
19a4('bum): sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gzugs dang / rta'i gzugs dang ba glang gi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs dang / 
19a5('bum): ston pa dang skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal myed khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba'i mdangs dga' / ba stond pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba stond pa dang
19a6('bum): nags tshal modangs dga' ba stond pa dang / de dag tu bstand pa dang / 'khor gi stanang dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa bting ste/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang kha zas
19a7('bum): dang / spyan gzigs mang po de lta bu stond pa dang / glu dang sil snyan gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing sbyin pa/ yongs su gtang ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus chom
19a8('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gis rnam par rtse ba dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs ston pa dang / bram ze'i rigs che zhing
19b1('bum): mtho' ba'i rigs ston pa dang / khyim bdag che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs stonang pa dang / ri rab stond pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams stond pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams ston pa
19b2('bum): dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dga' ldan gi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams stonang pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha nas
19b3('bum): ston pa dang / tshangs lnga nye phan gi lha rnams stonang pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams stond pa dang / tshangs chen gi lha rnams stonang pa dang / snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / chung snang
19b4('bum): lha rnams stond pa dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / dge ba'i rda lta rnams stond pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang
19b5('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams stond pa dang / 'bras bu che ba'i/ telha rnams stond pa dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams ston padang / myi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / shin tu
19b6('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams stonang pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / rnam shes mtha'
19b7('bum): yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang / gzugs med pa rnams ston/ 
19b8('bum): pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stond pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20a1('bum): po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
20a2('bum): la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang
20a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang kha phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
20a4('bum): la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma mye ngad pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la
20a5('bum): spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
20a6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myod pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
20a7('bum): rnams la spyong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / skabs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i
20a8('bum): kun lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / las ma gtan dang / rnam par ba rang pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyong pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang
20b1('bum): gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang sa drug pa
20b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs
20b3('bum): par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa ma de dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams
20b4('bum): rnams snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su rdzogadas par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag parabyed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / 
20b5('bum): dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam sa yongs su sgrub pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su
20b6('bum): sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dag ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku yan
20b7('bum): lolag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzind to// de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa/ spyod pa dam pa dang ldan
20b8('bum): pa rnams ni/ 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmyigs su myed na/ mying 'di de ltar myed pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa'i/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems can
21a1('bum): 'di dag ni dngos po myed pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / shes rab kyi pha rol
21a2('bum): pa tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang myi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / sems can du dmyigs/ sems can du gangag/ 
21a3('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs
21a4('bum): pa brjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims srungs ba la yang dag par skul ba yino// tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod
21a5('bum): pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa la yang / 
21a6('bum): dag par bskul ba yin badzang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus/ 
21a7('bum): rnam pa mam gzhan yang brtson 'grus rtsos pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bcin 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bzhin 'grus mim pa de dag gi legs pa brjo
21a8('bum): mthun pas dga' bar dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gi legs pa brjod pa
21b1('bum): sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par
21b2('bum): skul ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
21b3('bum): yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las/ 
21b4('bum): kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing ma thun pas dge' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang yan lag pa rgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang
21b5('bum): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gi le gas pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgya
21b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab
21b7('bum): pa'i gnas sprul yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bsgrub pa'i gnas lha'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
21b8('bum): mthun pas dge bar byu pa'iyin/ bdas kyang semasatan dang pel snyoms par 'jug pa yin gzhan yang bsam garten da pol yang dag par phrul ba yin/ bsam gtan po yin
22a1('bum): brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyad pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la smos
22a2('bum): par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i lags pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la
22a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang nga/ 
22a4('bum): par bskul ba yin/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dag
22a5('bum): brgya spyod pa yin la bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par/ 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la ya nga dag par bskul ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa
22a6('bum): brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin
22a7('bum): gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba
22a8('bum): spyod pa yin pa bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa
22b1('bum): de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ 
22b2('bum): sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms
22b3('bum): par yang dag par skul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang btang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag
22b4('bum): kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la ya dang dag par skul ba yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
22b5('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi leganyes pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam
22b6('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ so sa
22b7('bum): can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' brtsa spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin
22b8('bum): gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi les
23a1('bum): pag pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched pa
23a2('bum): bya yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mched la legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs
23a3('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
23a4('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa ba rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang yang dag/ 
23a5('bum): par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spro nga ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yang dag par spo nga ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang
23a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pa brjod pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang ba rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang ba rnams
23a7('bum): yang dag par bskul ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul ki gang bla rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan glang rngu 'phrul gi rnying ba rnams bsgom pa dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dag bar
23a8('bum): pa yin pa bdag kyang dbang po rnams ba skam pa yin gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dedabang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhin gang dbang po na rje/ 
23b1('bum): skom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang stabs rnams skom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par sprul pa yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs pa
23b2('bum): brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams skam pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang
23b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
23b4('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang 'phog rnas pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan ya/ dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul/ 
23b5('bum): ba yin 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
23b6('bum): mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i
23b7('bum): sgo gsum gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par thar
23b8('bum): tha rang pa brgyad bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par
24a1('bum): tha rad pa brgyad sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mtha ra kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang / 
24a2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang
24a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu skem pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa yin gzhan yang
24a4('bum): par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can 8 gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs
24a5('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kya nga ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang
24a6('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzinang rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
24a7('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa/ 
24a8('bum): brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams snyam pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa
24b1('bum): yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skal ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs
24b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa la yang dag par
24b3('bum): skul ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang
24b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i la yang dag par skal bde yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa
24b5('bum): yin/ sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po sgom pa yin/ 
24b6('bum): gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun
24b7('bum): pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang snying po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sna
24b8('bum): rje chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
25a1('bum): brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgo
25a2('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la yang dag
25a3('bum): bar skul ba yin/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pa
25a4('bum): dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dpe' byang bzang po brgyad bcu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu'i li// 
25a5('bum): ba brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dpe' gang dbang po bcu sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon
25a6('bum): ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ rab tu yang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma
25a7('bum): bas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su su par byed par myi 'gyur/ sa sa rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag par byed par myi 'gyu
25a8('bum): 'byed ches kyi dbyang sa rdzibar phyis kyang de bzhin/ bar du yang de bzhin pas na// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pa mang tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tsha
25b1('bum): mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings stonang to// sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas
25b2('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mnyam pa nyid du stand pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga po'o// 
25b3('bum): shes rab bam po gnyis pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang
25b4('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shin tu dmyigs su ma mchis la/ sems can du dmyigs su yang ma mchis na/ su'i don du byang chub
25b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ te/ nad pa bsgom pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di
25b6('bum): skad ces bka' sulang te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa skem ste/ rab 'byor dag
25b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsgom par mi 'gyur te/ 
25b8('bum): rab 'byorang yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang sems can rnams kyi don du shes
26a1('bum): garab kyi sa na phyin pa rnam ste/ gas rab kyi pa mang du phyin pa sa skyom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par mams
26a2('bum): na rnams yang dag pa snya so ga / gas pa pa bcom ldan 'angs pal ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/ sems can 'a mtha' yang gzhin ma lags su
26a3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur na ni/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan
26a4('bum): 'das rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yang
26a5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis dbaka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga yang dag pa'i mtha' yang / kye dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ba yang myed nad rang bzhin
26a6('bum): la rang bzhin la gnas par 'gyur ba yang myed na/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can gi mtha'
26a7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dgazhan ma yin te
26a8('bum): de ltar na sems can gi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gsalang pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
26b1('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gang lags
26b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byirang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar ba
26b3('bum): sto/ sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do// sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas/ sbyin pa de'i thog ma dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus ston do to/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i thog ma yang stong tha ma'i mtha'
26b4('bum): yang stong / dbus kyang stong / de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang ste// nga / sbyin bdag kyang stong / len pa yang stong par stond cing rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag gis sbyin
26b5('bum): ba yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du/ sems shig/ sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ len pa yang ga zhan no// snyam du ma sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod nam
26b6('bum): sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// / snyam du sems/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan len pa yang gzhan no// snyam du myi sems pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang / bdud rtsi'i
26b7('bum): 'bras bu dang / mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma 'janid cig/ de ci'i phyir
26b8('bum): zhi na 'di ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pos stong ngo // de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo // len pa yang len pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni
27a1('bum): sbyin pa myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang len pa myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong ngo zhes brjod do// gzhan
27a2('bum): yang rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/ chur rigs kyi bu
27a3('bum): srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byin par len pa spongs la/ ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa
27a4('bum): spongs la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldogarnga bar gyis shig/ rdzun du smra ba spongs la/ rdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ phra ma spongs la phra ma las phyir ldog pa
27a5('bum): gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa spongs la gzhe gcod pa'i tshig las phyir ldeg par gyis shig/ tshig khyal spangs la/ kyi tshig khyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ chags sems spong
27a6('bum): la chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ gnod sems spongs la/ gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ log par lta ba spongs la de log par lta bas phyir ldog par gyis shi/ 
27a7('bum): rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang myed kyis/ rigs kyi bu sems dang / gang gis srog gcong bar bya ba'i srog chags dang / gang gis gcod bar bya ba'i de
27a8('bum): lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang ma byin par blang ba dang / gang ma byin par len par btags pa dang / gang gis drangs pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / 
27b1('bum): gang 'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang / gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang brdzun du smra ba dang / gang brdzun du smra bar btags pa dang / 
27b2('bum): gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yin/ gang phra ma dang phra mar btags pa dang / gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod
27b3('bum): bar btags pa dang gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang gis tshig khyal pa smra ba dang tshig khyal par btags pa dang / gang gis tshig khyal ba smra ba de lta bu'i chos
27b4('bum): kyang gang zhig yin/ gang chags sems skyed pa dang / chags sems su btags pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ gang gnod sos
27b5('bum): su bskyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / gang gis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang zhig yin/ gong log par lta ba dang / log par lta bar btags pa
27b6('bum): dang / gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes chos stond cing / tshul khrims la 'gog de// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas
27b7('bum): pa de lta bu dang ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/ sbyin pa'i
27b8('bum): 'bras bu dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstand tam// rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bung bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas/ de la mngon
28a1('bum): par zhen par myi byed do// mngon par zhen pa myed pas 'khrug par myi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do// shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad banang
28a2('bum): nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig rten gi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid gang
28a3('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes de lta bu'i chos gang yang myi dmyigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das
28a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid do/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod sems shing
28a5('bum): 'khrug par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na 'di skad du dems shing stond te/ rigs kyi bu bzod pa sgrubs shingakyad bzod pa bsgoms shig/ nges pa dang sems zhi ba dang / dang / 
28a6('bum): du sems pa'i ngang tshul can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang gis gnod par bya ba dang / gang gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gis stong pa yin gas
28a7('bum): rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/ gnod pa ni su la byed/ cis ni gnod par bya'o sems dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid gang yin/ 
28a8('bum): pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ nyan
28b1('bum): zos rnams kyis ma byas sa/ lha rnams kyi sam byas so klu rnams kyis ma byas// gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so// dri za rnams kyis ma byas so/ lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas
28b2('bum): nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas ni/ mi 'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so/ sum cu rtsa
28b3('bum): gsum gi lha rnams kyis ma byaso// mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha'
28b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes medang 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de ni/
