28b5('bum): rtag par yang bzhin gis stong pa'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la yang gnod par myi byed do// zhes nas rab 'o/ byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
28b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyar te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing rim kyis bla na
28b7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par stond to// yang dag par skul lo yang dag par gzeng stong ngo do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go 'du long rab tu 'god
28b8('bum): de yang 'jig rtend kyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gis thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang myed do/ 
29a1('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don tu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ 
29a2('bum): de la sems can du dmyigs pa myed do// sems can du gdags pa dmyigs pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la chos thams cad ni sems can kyis dben pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems
29a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di ltar lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag
29a4('bum): par skul te rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba/ 
29a5('bum): 'am/ gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de// chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid las myi 'ang kyi' ba yin gyis/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed la/ 
29a6('bum): me lo khor te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong
29a7('bum): banyid ngam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngam thag sa/ 
29a8('bum): dang ma ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam / chos thams cad srung ba nyid dam/ rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngam dngos po/ 
29b1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnam
29b2('bum): dbang po rnams samastobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad
29b3('bum): myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam te mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
29b4('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam gzu mdzangs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
29b5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rdzas sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig/ 
29b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cing sgrib pa myed par rtogs shing / sgrib pa myed pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do zhes/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
29b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par ston ngo // yang dag par skul lo// yang dag par gze
29b8('bum): stong ngo // yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go// 'dul lo/ rab tu 'god do// ci nas kyang gnyis la myi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'gong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhini stong pa nyid ni gnyi su myed de/ 
30a1('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// gnyis su myed pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas pa myed do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
30a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus
30a3('bum): bsam gtan nam shes rab bam/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
30a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' ma las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong dpa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
30a5('bum): dmachos thams cad stong pa nyid dam rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed
30a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam stobs rnams sam/ byang chub
30a7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams samaHtshad med pa rnams sam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par/ 
30a8('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rang pa rnams sam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dag mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang
30b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa
30b2('bum): yang na byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom la/ chos de dag gnyis par yang yid la byed cig/ mi gnyis par yid la ma byed cig/ 
30b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yid la bya ba ma yin/ myi gnyis par yang yid la bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub seMs
30b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang ba mabazhin stong pa nyid la yongs su smin par byed do// yongs su smin par
30b5('bum): byas nas rim gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'gro do lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// phyir mi 'ong bya ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god dang rang
30b6('bum): byang chub la 'go // lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do// rab 'byerang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten
30b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can sems g.yengs pa rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin snyoms shig
30b8('bum): g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzinang gi 'du shes ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba 'amang rtse gcig tu 'gyu
31a1('bum): nas gang yang dgas su sred de/ khyod ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te/ rang bzhin spong ba nyid sa spya na/ lus dang gdang / yid kyis dge bar chos gang ci yang byed/ 
31a2('bum): sbyin pa gtong ba'am/ tshul khrims srung ba 'am bzod pa sgom pa 'am/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin skyed dma' shes rab sgom pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid la spyong ngam/ phyi dang / 
31a3('bum): nyid la spyod la spyod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod la spyod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod la spyod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ 'dus stong pa nyid la spyod
31a4('bum): 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyidzad la spyod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dmador ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod da
31a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
31a6('bum): dam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod dam yang dag por spong ba rnams la spyod dam rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod dma' dbang
31a7('bum): rnams la spyod dam/ stobs rnams la spyod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod dam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye
31a8('bum): dam bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam/ tshad myed pa rnams la spyod ngam/ gzugs myong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod ngas// rnam par tha rang pa rnams la spyod dam/ mthar kyis gnas
31b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la spyod dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams
31b2('bum): la spyod dam gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod dam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod dam/ byams
31b3('bum): pa chen po la spyod ngam snying rje chen po la spyod dam/ dga' ba chen po la spyod dam/ btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod dam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum
31b4('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/ nyan thos kyi la la spyod dam/ rang sangs rgyas du kyi lam la spyod dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod dam/ 
31b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bra sa bu la spyod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid/ 
31b6('bum): la spyod ngam/ rang byang chub la spyod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam// sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba la spyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod
31b7('bum): rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag las gron chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su stond te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i na
31b8('bum): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ bar dga' yang las myi byed par myi 'gyur gyi/ dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ 
32a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos
32a2('bum): pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du yang rnam par chud mi za ste/ rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par gzungs thob cing / lus kyi ngas
32a3('bum): po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi dbang po myi nyam pa yi na no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar/ rnam pa thams
32a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid shi nang tu bsgoms pas/ rnam pa thams ca// / da mkhyend pa nyid du bsgoms pa de las thams cad shinang tu ga te/ sgoms par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
32a5('bum): kyi lam 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/ sangs rgya sa kyi lam shi nang tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chung myi
32a6('bum): za ba'i tshul gis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shinang tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro ba
32a7('bum): 'khor ban 'khor yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang / yongs su su nyam so// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa ro yang tu phyin pa la snang
32a8('bum): pa'i tshe rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang du
32b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing shes rab 'chal ba can/ blo chung ba rnams mthong na 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi las/ 
32b2('bum): gang ji snyed byed kyang rung ste/ de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rtog shig dang / khyod kyis las de thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni
32b3('bum): gang 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am yongs su 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni yongs su nye/ 
32b4('bum): par myi 'gyur zhing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni yongs su nyam pa'i chos gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na te 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ tedangos po myed pa yang
32b5('bum): ma yin/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci ni/ ga yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar byang kyi chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
32b6('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su stond te// de ltar 'dems shing rjes su ston te/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa yon/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba/ 
32b7('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skal ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ 
32b8('bum): gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dgra par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso' sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang / 
33a1('bum): ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 
33a2('bum): bdag kyang bsam gnyis bral snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms pa 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ba
33a3('bum): gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa
33a4('bum): byams pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadad par byams pa sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag zad kyang rtag tu rgyu nang mi 'chad par snying rje la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang / 
33a5('bum): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par snying rje sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dga' ba la gan pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dga' ba sgom pa
33a6('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bdang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par btang snyoms sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang na/ 
33a7('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rnam
33a8('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang cung zad sred pa
33b1('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye
33b2('bum): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
33b3('bum): la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33b4('bum): la yang dag par skul ba yinate bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rolan tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus
33b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang brtson ste/ 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yinabadag kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ 
33b6('bum): gzhan yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag
33b7('bum): skul ba yin/ bdag kyang nang stong pa nyid la sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par
33b8('bum): skul ba yin/ bdag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang phyi ning stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang ga
34a1('bum): bar skul ba yin bdag kyang chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang do/ 
34a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgo
34a3('bum): ba yin/ gzhan 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skom pa yin/ gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par sprul
34a4('bum): yin/ bdag kyang theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yi
34a5('bum): gzhan yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba/ yin/ bdag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin dbang/ 
34a6('bum): kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdog kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rang gi
34a7('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin // gzhan yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dngos po myed pa/ 
34a8('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba
34b1('bum): bdag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin
34b2('bum): gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin// 
34b3('bum): bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang // 
34b4('bum): dag par skal ba yin/ bdag kyang stabs rnams sgom padu yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang / 
34b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom po yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul/ 
34b6('bum): zhing bdag kyang rnam par tharang pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin gzhan yang rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags / 
34b7('bum): bden pa rnams la yang dag par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par tha ra pa la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha ra pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
34b8('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skal ba yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mngon par shes
35a1('bum): pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzinang rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgra
35a2('bum): rnams slob pa yin gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
35a3('bum): yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ 
35a4('bum): gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul da ba yin/ bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ gzha na yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag
35a5('bum): kyang snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la slob pa yin gzhan yang sangs
35a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis la yang / 
35a7('bum): bar skul ba yin/ bdag kyang dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par slob pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras/ 
35a8('bum): bu'i shes pa skyed cing / de la yang mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa bskyed cing de la yang mi gnas pa yi
35b1('bum): gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la yang mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/ bdag ska
35b2('bum): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa snyed cing de la yang myi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'gad pa yin bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes ba skyed cing / de sa yang mi gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang / 
35b3('bum): rang byang chub la 'god pa yin/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed pa yin pa gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su stond pa dang / gzhog cing 'dul ba dang / 'god pa yin te/ 
35b4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyar rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed chang pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing
35b5('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i tshe/ nam yang las myed par gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa lags na
35b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos ma lags pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa/ 
35b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// chos thams cad
35b8('bum): ni rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can myi dmyigs so// chos myi dmyigs so// chos ma yin pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dgal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong/ 
36a1('bum): gzhig yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par myi 'gyur te// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
36a2('bum): nas kyang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to// rang bzhin stong pa'i chos de dag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo 'du shes
36a3('bum): ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor dmyig ni rang bzhin gri stong ngo // rna ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // sna na ring
36a4('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // lce ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lus ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // yid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor nga gzugs ni rang bzhin gis stong po/ sgra ni rang ba ni/ 
36a5('bum): gis stong ngo // dri ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // ro ni rang bzhin gyi sa stong ngo // reg ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / chos ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa ni
36a6('bum): rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam pa
36a7('bum): shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong
36a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg ni rang bzhin gis stong po yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / 
36b1('bum): rab 'byo rang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni ra
36b2('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho
36b3('bum): ba ni rang bzhin gas stong ngo // rab 'byor da sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // me'i khams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gis stong / 
36b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor da ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'du byed ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 
36b5('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // mying dang gzug nyes ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni rang bzhin/ gis stong ngo // reg pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo ngo// tshor ba ni rang
36b6('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // sred pa rang bzhin gis stong ngo // len pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // skye ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / rga shi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo ngo/ rab
36b7('bum): 'byorang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo/ brtson 'grus
36b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni
37a1('bum): rang bzhin gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni/ 
37a2('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
37a3('bum): nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gos stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // chos
37a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / myi dmyigardzas pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dngos po myed
37a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong panyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ste/ nga pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i/ rab 'byor/ 
37a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gis
37a7('bum): snying ngo // stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gos stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rab 'byor/ 
37a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / tshad myed pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / gzugs myed po snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ 
37b1('bum): rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
37b2('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // 
37b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // myi 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin/ 
37b4('bum): gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo / dga' chen po ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni
37b5('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo // myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis// ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu ni ra bzhin gis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis
37b6('bum): stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis spyod
37b7('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
37b8('bum): phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // zhes bya bar chos stonang ngo to// khams bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // zhes bya bar chos ston du
38a1('bum): ba rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo // zhes bya bar chos stonang // stong pa nyid kyi thams/ 
38a2('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo/ zhes bya bar chos
38a3('bum): stond to// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// dbang po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// stobs lnga ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos
38a4('bum): ston to// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni rang bzhin gis stong po/ zhes bya bar chos stonang to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rgyad pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stond to// 'phag
38a5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos s+ho// nad to// bsam gtan bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhenyes bya bar chos ston to// tshad myed pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong
38a6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston ngo to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston
38a7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes/ 
38a8('bum): bya bar chos ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ 
38b1('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// 
38b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gis stong po zhes bya bar chos stonang to// byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston ngo to// snying rje chen po ni rang bzhini gis stong ngo zhes bya bar
38b3('bum): chos stonang to// dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
38b4('bum): pa bcwo brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// kye myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gisastong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang ngo to// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad
38b5('bum): cu ni rang bzhin gis steng ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gas stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin
38b6('bum): gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang ngo to// dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stonang to// rang bya
38b7('bum): chub ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston ngo // lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis spyod do zhes bya bar chos sanang ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rlung bzhin
38b8('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston to/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rab 'byor dgal te/ nang stong pa nyid ni ring bzhin spong bam
39a1('bum): ga yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te phyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma
39a2('bum): bye yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ 
39a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub seMs
39a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te chen kya rngu po stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub seMs
39a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis/ stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te/ kyi don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub
39a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos stand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub seMs
39a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos snanang par myi 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa'
39a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sos
39b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
39b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstanang par myi 'gyur ro// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
39b3('bum): chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
39b4('bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand paradu myi 'gyur ro// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang ba zhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
39b5('bum): chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya ba chos bsta nang par myi 'gyur ro// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems
39b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
39b7('bum): sems das chen pos ches thams cad rang bzhin gis snang zhes bya bar chos bstanang bar myi 'gyur ro// ga te dngas po myed pa song pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong ba ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems su
39b8('bum): thos kyang rgyas thams cad dang bzhin gyis stong nge zhes bya bar chos bstan par myi 'gyur ro// galate ba nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gis snang ba ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs pa bad kyi/ 
40a1('bum): ga kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstanang par myi 'gyur ro// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin na ni byang chub sems
40a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstand par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur na/ rang bzhin stong / 
40a3('bum): pa nyid ni 'jig par myi 'gyur/ rtag pa ma yin te/ phyis myed par 'gro ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yul na myi gnas phyogs na myi gnas te/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin// 
40a4('bum): grang du yang 'gro ba ma yin te/ de ni chos gang gnas pa nyid do/ de la ni chos gang yang 'phel ba dmyigs sama'agrib pa dmyigs sam/ 'gong pa dmyigs pa 'am/ skye ba dmyis
40a5('bum): pa 'am/ 'byung ba dmyigs pa 'am/ 'gag pa dmyigs pa 'amakun nas nyon mongs pa dmyigs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dmyigs pa myed do// de ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin te/ 
40a6('bum): de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ chos gang yang 'jug pa 'am/ myi 'jug par mthong ba mye/ 
40a7('bum): de chos thams cad ni 'jug pa skyed cing gnas pa myed so/ doni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
40a8('bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di sar des sgrib pa'i chos de yang yang ga
40b1('bum): rjes su myi mthong ste/ chos thams cad ni sgrib pa myed par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag myi dmyigs/ bdag tu gdags pa myi dmyigasatesems
40b2('bum): can myi dmyigs/ sems can du gdags pa myi dmyigs/ srog myi dmyigs/ klu'agro bya'ang myi dmyigs/ 'gro bar gdags pa myi dmyigs/ gso ba'ang myi dmyigs/ gsol bar gangs
40b3('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ skyes bu yang myi dmyigs/ skyes bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gang zag kyang myi dmyigs/ gang zag du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shed can yang myi dmyigs/ shed na
40b4('bum): du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shed bdag kyang myi dmyigs/ shed bdag tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byed pa po yang myi dmyigs/ byed por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor
40b5('bum): ba po yang myi dmigs/ tshor ba po gdags pa yang myi dmyigasaslong ba po yang myi dmyigs/ slong ba por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ kun nas slong ba po yang myi dmyigs
40b6('bum): kun nas slong ba por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes po poyang myi dmyigs/ shes pa por gdags pa yang myi dmyig sa/ mthong ba po yang myi dmyigs/ mthong ba por gangag/ 
40b7('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyang myi dmyigs
40b8('bum): 'du shes su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmigs/ 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myed kyi
41a1('bum): myig kyang myi dmyigs/ myig tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba yang myi dmyigs/ rna bar gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ sna yang myi dmyigs sngar gdags pa yang mying kyi/ 
41a2('bum): lce yang myi dmyigs/ lcer gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyang myi dmyigs/ lus su gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ yid kyang mi dmyigs/ yid du gdags pa yang mi dmyigs gzug
41a3('bum): kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs sgra yang myi dmyigs/ sgrar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dri yang myi dmyigs/ drir gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ro yang myi dmyigs
41a4('bum): ror gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg kyang myi dmyigs/ reg tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos kyang mi dmyigs/ chos su gang chachags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang ni
41a5('bum): dmyigs myig gi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyi/ gas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par
41a6('bum): shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes par gang gis pa yang myi dmyigs lus kyi
41a7('bum): rnam par shes pa yong mi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang mi dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 
41a8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
41b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang mi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi
41b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par gdags par yang myi dmyigs so/ 
41b3('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs
41b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang mying / dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags
41b5('bum): kha yang myi dmyigs lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar yang myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshe ra bar gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg/ 
41b6('bum): ba'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te re/ 
41b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams su gdags pa yang myo myigs/ chu'i khams su kyang myi dmyags// chu'i khams su gdags
41b8('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ me'i khams kyang myo dmyigs me'i khams su gdags pa yong myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs nam mkha'i khams
42a1('bum): myi dmyigs nam mkha'i khams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags par myi dmyigs/ ma rig pa yang myi
42a2('bum): dmyigs ma rig par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyang myi dmyigs/ 'du byed du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa yang myi
42a3('bum): dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs su myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs su gdogs pa yang myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug kyang myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ reg pa yang myi dmyigs
42a4('bum): reg par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshor ba yang myi dmyigs tshor bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sred pa yang myi dmyi dwags/ sred pa gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yang myi dmyig
42a5('bum): len par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ srid pa yang myi dmyigasasrid pa gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ skye ba yang myi dmyi gas/ skye bar gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rga shi yang myi
42a6('bum): dmyigs rga shir myi dmyigs// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang par gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs
42a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pa ro mad du phyin par gdags pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha mang tu phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs brtson 'grus kyi
42a8('bum): nid par yang smi rigs pa brtson 'grus kyi pa ro lang phyin par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs// bsam gtanag pa yang tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gipar mang du byi nga pa yang ming phyin
42b1('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs nang
42b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid du gdags par myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi nang
42b3('bum): stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid
42b4('bum): du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi nga myigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas
42b5('bum): stong pa nyid du gdugs par yang myi dmyigasa'adus ma byas stong bo nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du ga dgas pa yang myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
42b6('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyi gas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyin
42b7('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs chos
42b8('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyig
43a1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa/ 
43a2('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
43a3('bum): du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyigs yang
43a4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su kyang myi dmyigs/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dbang po rnams kyang
43a5('bum): dmyigs/ dbang po rnams su gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ stobs rnams su gdags par yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMm
43a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang
43a7('bum): ba yang myi dmyigs// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ bras ma ga
43a8('bum): rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang mi byas/ tshad myed pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dkyi
43b1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par thadad pa rnams kyi myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rang pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas
43b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
43b3('bum): smon pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ mngon par
43b4('bum): shes pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzind rnams su gdag sa pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myi dmyigs
43b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ de bzhi nyen gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ de bzhi// rten gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
43b6('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nga myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su gdags
43b7('bum): pa yang ma yin/ byams pa chen po yang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs sangs rgyas kyi
43b8('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang kyi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
44a1('bum): gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang kyi
44a2('bum): pa dmyigs phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdugs pa yang myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rang byang chub kyang myi dmyigs rang byang chus/ 
44a3('bum): tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmigs/ lam go rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa yang mi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs rnam pa/ 
44a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi ni na po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang myi dmyigs/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dpel/ 
44a5('bum): byang bzang po brgyad bcu yang myi dmyigs/ dpe'i byad bzang po brgyad bcur gdags pa yang myi dmyigs na/ bla na myed/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tsom za bar 'gyur ba lnga/ 
44a6('bum): ga las 'ong rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa'i sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bste na nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/ 
44a7('bum): mar rgyun tu chos stonang no/ rab 'byorang de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa de dag la rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba la yod dam yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'amang phyir / 
44a8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'amang dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ 
44b1('bum): de ni'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad dngos po myed na/ sems can gang zhig
44b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla ra
44b3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'god par bya ste/ gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris pa'i skyes bu dag phyinang ci log myed pa la gzhag go// 'dul lo rab tu 'god do// phyinang ci log gang yin
44b4('bum): pa de yang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/ phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa med pa ni phyinang ci log ma yin pa'o// gang 'dul phyin ci log myed pa de la bdag myed do// sems can myed do/ 
44b5('bum): srog myed do// 'gro ba myed do// gsor ba myed do// skyes bu myed// / gang zag myed do// shed can myed do// shed bdag mye nga ngo // byed pa po myed do// tshor ba po myed do// shes pa po myed do mthong
44b6('bum): ba po myed do// de la gzugs myed do// tshor ba med do// 'du shes myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// de la myig myed du rna ba myed do/ sna med do/ lce myed do/ lus myed do/ yid skyed
44b7('bum): del gzugs myedang/ sgra med nga// dri med de/ med do/ reg med nga/ mi snyid // des stsog kyi rnam pa gas paskyed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mying po sna rnam par shes pa myed nga lce rnam
44b8('bum): shes pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ klu'i 'dus te/ 
45a1('bum): reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed
45a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// 
45a3('bum): rim sna'i khams myed do// chu'i khams myed do/ me'i khams myed do// rlung gi khams myed do/ nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// de la ma rig pa myed do/ 'du byed
45a4('bum): myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// mying dang gzugs myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// rda sred pa myed do// len pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myedado/ 
45a5('bum): rga shi myed do// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol khyed tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
45a6('bum): pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// de la nang stong pa nyid myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid
45a7('bum): stong pa nyid myed do// ga chen po stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid byed de/ 
45a8('bum): thig ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed dong myi dmyigs
45b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid myeng // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed do// yang dag par sna
45b2('bum): ba rnams myed do rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed
45b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// bas mo gtan rnams myed do/ tshad myed pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myong ngo // 
45b4('bum): mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed do/ mngon par shes pa rnams myed do// 
45b5('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do// myi 'jigs/ k+She pu rnams myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed do// 
45b6('bum): byams pa chen po myed de/ snying rje chen po myed do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed do// de la rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi
45b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do// 
45b8('bum): shes rab dum bu bcu bzhi pa bam po gsum pa'o// gang la gzugs myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa nga/ 
46a1('bum): 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / gang la myig myed pa dang / rna ba myed pa dang / sna myed pa dang / lce myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / yid myed
46a2('bum): pa dang / gang la gzugs myed pa dang / sgra myed pa dang / dri med pa dang / ro myed pa dang / reg med pa dang / chos myed pa dang / gang la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed
46a3('bum): dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / gang la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / 
46a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed rngu pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / gang la myig gi
46a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te// reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myong ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
46a6('bum): tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher rab myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / gang la sa'i khams myed pa dang / chu'i khams myed pa dang / me 'i la
46a7('bum): myed pa dang / rlung gi khams med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / gang la ma rig pa myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / mying dang gzun
46a8('bum): myed pa dang skye mched drug myed pa dang / reg pa myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang / sred pa myed pa dang / len pa myed pa dang / srid pa mying pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / rga shi myed pa dang / gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol
46b1('bum): phyind pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
46b2('bum): myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / gang la nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang 'a chen po stong
46b3('bum): pa nyid myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
46b4('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid med pa dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / myi dmyig
46b5('bum): la stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid / stong pa nyid myed pa dang / gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
46b6('bum): myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myed pa dang / dbang po rnams myed pa dang / stobs rnams myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed pa dang
46b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa dang / gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams myed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
46b8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams myed pa dang / gang la rnam par tha rang pa brgyad myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
47a1('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed pa dang / myi 'jig
47a2('bum): pa rnams myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed pa dang / byams pa chen po myed pa dang / snying rje chen po myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed pa dang // de la rgyu nang tu zhugs
47a3('bum): 'bras bu myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myed pa dang / rang byang chub myed pa dang / gang la thams cad shes pa nyid myed
47a4('bum): dang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang du ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myed pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyi dzad de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
47a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems can phyin ci log tu gyu rad pa rnams/ sems can gi 'du shes las
47a6('bum): 'grel te gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grel to// gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes las 'gro lang te/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grelang ngo to// gang zag pa myed pa/ 
47a7('bum): chos 'di lta ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
47a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang ting
47b1('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas
47b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa de ni rang bzhin
47b3('bum): stong pa nyid de de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ de la bdag myed do// sems can myed do// srog myed do// 'gro ba myed do// gso ba myed do// skyes bu myed do// gang
47b4('bum): zag myed do// shed can myeng do// shed bdag myed do// byed pa po myed do// tshor ba po myed do// shes pa po myed do// mthong ba po myed do// gzugs myed de tshor ba myed do// 'du
47b5('bum): myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// myig myed do// rna ba myed do// sna myed do// lce myed do// lus mye da do// yid myed do// gzugs myed do// sgra myed do/ dri myed do/ 
47b6('bum): ro myed do// reg myed do// chos myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par
47b7('bum): shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus
47b8('bum): te reg pa myed de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed na
48a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sa'i khams myed do// chu'i khams myed do// 
48a2('bum): me'i khams myed do// rlung gi khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// ma rig pa myed do// 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// mying dang gzugs myed do// 
48a3('bum): skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myed do// rga shi myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
48a4('bum): pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa myong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid
48a5('bum): myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma
48a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mye do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhini stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams ca
48a7('bum): stong pa nyid myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// 
48a8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do/ stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// 
48b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed do// bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad med pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// 
48b2('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnam
48b3('bum): myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do// myi 'a jigs pa bzhi myed do// so so yang yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do// 
48b4('bum): byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myed do// myi chen po'im / tshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis myed do// dpe' byang bzang po brgya cu myed do// 
48b5('bum): rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// yon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// ngag bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
48b6('bum): myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa nas lam gi don du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
48b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de yang snga nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ phyin cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ bar du yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid / denam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong/ 
48b8('bum): ba ma yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyipha ro la tu phrin pa la spyod cing/ sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can kyi 'du shes yorje/ 
49a1('bum): ga dgrol ba'i phyir/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do// de lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i che/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang byang chub sems
49a2('bum): dpa'i lam dang lam thams cad la spyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
49a3('bum): yongs su dag par byas/ tshe'i 'du byed byon kyis brlabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
49a4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rgyun myi gcod do// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/ 'das pa
49a5('bum): dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de da ga gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhi na stong pa nyid do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom
49a6('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
49a7('bum): gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'chi skyong ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams ma gtogs par gzhan las 'jig rten gi khams su 'byung bar mi
49a8('bum): 'gyur ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thos
49b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid las yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thos
49b2('bum): cad la spyod cing / gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du shes kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang / 
49b3('bum): gzhan no// 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
49b4('bum): kyang gzhan no// rna ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyidakyang gzhan no// sna yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid da kyang gzhan no// lce yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
49b5('bum): kyang gzhan no// lus kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ kyang gzhan no// yid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stongarje pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
49b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sgra yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dri yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ro yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ 
49b7('bum): reg kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chos kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
49b8('bum): gzhan no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sde'i rnam par shes pa / 
50a1('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
50a2('bum): kyang gzhan no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// 
50a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yid kyi 'dus
50a4('bum): te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang nga bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i/ 
50a5('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan nosna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
50a6('bum): kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba
50a7('bum): yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sa'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chu'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// me'i khams
50a8('bum): kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rlung gi khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
50b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ma rig pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
50b2('bum): gzhan no// rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skye mched drug kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong
50b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sred pa yang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
50b4('bum): lend pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// srid pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skye ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan na/ 
50b5('bum): rga shi yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin
50b6('bum): pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ni brtson 'grus kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa yang gzhan no// 
50b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan na/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
50b8('bum): gzhan no sanang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no rang bzhin spong ba
51a1('bum): kyang gzhan no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chen po
51a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
51a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ge 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan na/ 
51a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa da nyid kyang gzhan no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chos thams cad ste/ 
51a5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ragi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong paranyid kyang gzhan no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan na
51a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po mye
51a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dran pa nye bar gzhag
51a8('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
51b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dbang po rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stobs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang
51b2('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
51b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
51b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin du stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
51b5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan no// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma/ myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan no/ rang bzhin spyong/ 
51b6('bum): ba nyid kyang gzhan no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ gzungs kyi sgo rna
51b7('bum): kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong
51b8('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byams pa chen po yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// snying rje chen po yang gzhan
52a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa/ 
52a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan
52a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang byang chub kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
52a4('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi da bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid kyi gzu gas nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
52a5('bum): gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhini stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang
