99a7('bum): rnam pa yo / nga/ rnams pa sa dang/ na skye nga/ gas pa ni
99b1('bum): la gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byas/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe'
99b2('bum): byed bzang po brgyad cu yongs su bsgrubs/ myi nyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su spyod po yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
99b3('bum): de yang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ myig gi
99b4('bum): rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i rang bzhin lnga gnas/ rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi rang bzhin la glan so/ 
99b5('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ sgra'i rang bzhin la glen sa/ 'i rang bzhin la gnas/ ri ring bzhin lta ga so/ reg gi rang bzhin la gnas/ chos kyi rang bzhin la gan so// 
99b6('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin le gnas/ rna ba'i rna bar shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus
99b7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 
99b8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin la gnas
100a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la rang bzhin la gnas ni rjerna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 
100a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sa'i khas
100a3('bum): kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par shes
100a4('bum): nga'i khams kyi rang bzhin la gnas// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin la/ gnas/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin la gnas
100a5('bum): skye mched drug gi rang bzhin la gnas/ reg pa'i rang bzhin la gan sa/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sred pa'i rang bzhin lag nas/ len pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ srid pa'i rang bzhin la
100a6('bum): gnas/ skye ba'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rga shi'i rang bzhin la gnas// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol
100a7('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ bsam gtan ga pha ro lang tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin la
100a8('bum): gnas// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid kyir
100b1('bum): bzhin la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
100b2('bum): la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang
100b3('bum): bzhin la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
100b4('bum): bzhin la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhi ngan la gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rtsus
100b5('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas/ stobs lnga'i rang bzhin la gnas/ bya/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 'phags
100b6('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ 'phags pa'i badren pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ bsam gtan bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i
100b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
100b8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi re bya bzhin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ gzus kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ 
101a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin la gnas/ byams pa chen po'i rang / 
101a2('bum): bzhin la gnas/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rang bzhin la gnas// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ lan cig phyir
101a3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin la gnas/ dgra' bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la ga nas/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ lam gi rnam pa
101a4('bum): shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la gnas/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa/ ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin la gnas te/ byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par/ 
101a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// rang bzhin de yang nye bar zhi ba ste/ chos gang yang 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'bri bar byed pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 
101a6('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ thob par bya/ mngon par rtogs par byed pa myed de/ de yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'
101a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/ don dam par ni gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed ngam/ rnam par
101a8('bum): shes pa 'am// myig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam// gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/ chos sam// myig gi rnam par shes pa/ 
101b1('bum): 'am tarna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus
101b2('bum): te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
101b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
101b4('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am// sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam// ma rig pa 'am/ 
101b5('bum): 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sa ma/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am// sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 
101b6('bum): shi 'am// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ bsam gtan gi pha rol / 
101b7('bum): phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 
101b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ 
102a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid dma?/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ rangs pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
102a2('bum): dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 
102a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ 
102a4('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams so/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid du/ nga / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par
102a5('bum): shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi ske rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sa ma/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa
102a6('bum): rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dam// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir myi
102a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ gang byang chub tu spyod pa'i chos de lta bu yong / 
102a8('bum): myed do/ chos de dag thams cad ni 'jig gnyen gi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ gdags pa yin gi don dam par na ma yin no// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa
102b1('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub tu spyod kyang sems de dag myi dmyigs te/ sems can de dag myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyang myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi
102b2('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor da da dri snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rab 'byor khyod kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i phyir dbang po rnams thob par gyur bu dang / bar tshod byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam/ rgyun tu zhug/ 
102b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob bam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bam/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyurang ba'i tshe/ rmyi lam lam/ sems sam/ lam 'am/ 'bras
102b4('bum): bu dmyigs par 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ 'o na ji ltar khyod rab 'byor kyis dgra' bcom pa'i
102b5('bum): 'bras bu thob bo zhes bya bar bka' stsal te/ lung bstan par 'gyu re/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig gnyen gyi/ tha ska nye bar bar bzung ste/ bkas lung bstan te/ bcom
102b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// gzugs kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// tshor ba yang
102b7('bum): 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 'du shes kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// 'du byed kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// rnam par shes pa yang 'jig gten gi tha
102b8('bum): snyang du gdags pa'o// myig kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// rna ba yang 'jig gten ga tha snyad du btags pa'o// sna yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// lce yang 'jig gten
103a1('bum): sgyu du gas pa'o// sus byung shug da ge sa gas sa byung 'ag dge bsung du rtags pa 'o// gzugs kyang 'dreg kyis snang du brtags pan
103a2('bum): ga na gi steng du gags par// dris du 'jig gtad gi kyi slong dus sa // yang rig garten gi ba snyed du gas dag/ rig kya na paden gi sa du gas pa/ 
103a3('bum): kyang shig gi gas // smyig ban ga na ga sang dugags nga// dpo rnam pa shes pa yang jog garten ga gang du gags
103a4('bum): snang du gags na nas tig pa yang len tan gi sang du gas / 
103a5('bum): rnal dus ga pa yang mig na byung du gags pa'o// shA'i sa / jug ga gi sa ru bags pa'o// lce'i sa te ga pa yang lam ga gi nga gas
103a6('bum): ma garten gipa snang du gags pang // na pa'i tshus te dag pa 'i rkyen kyi nyim mig garte ges slo tshugams pa'o// gA'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang jig sa
103b1('bum): gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du
103b2('bum): btags pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// sa'i khams 'jig gton gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// chu'i khams 'jig gtan ge
103b3('bum): tha snyad du btags pa'o// me'i khams kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rlung gi khams kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig gten gri tha snyad
103b4('bum): ru btags pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'jigagatan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// ma rig pa yang 'jig pa/ twen gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 'du byed kyang 'jig gtan
103b5('bum): gri tha snyad du btags pa'o// rnam par shes pa yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// mying dang gzugs kyang jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// skye mched drug kyang
103b6('bum): 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// reg pa yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// tshor ba yang 'jig gtan gi the snyad du btags pa'o// sbed pa yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du
103b7('bum): btags pa'o// len pa yang 'jig gnyen gri tha snyad du btags pa'o// srid pa yang 'jigagaten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// skye ba yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rga shi sang
103b8('bum): 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 
104a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol
104a2('bum): tu phyind pa yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'jig gten ga tha snyad du btags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// phyi stong/ 
104a3('bum): pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid/ 
104a4('bum): kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// don dam stong pa nyi dzod kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 'dus byasastong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gri tha snyad du btags pa'o// 'dus/ 
104a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// ma/ tha' las 'das pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btag sa pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig
104a6('bum): gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du gdags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
104a7('bum): kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig ga ten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 
104a8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gnyen gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o
104b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang 'jig gnyen gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du
104b2('bum): btags pa'o// dbang po rnams kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// stobs rnams kyang 'ji gra gtan gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du
104b3('bum): btags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang 'jig gnyen gi tha skad du btags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang 'jig gnyen gi tha skad du btags pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi yang 'jig rten/ 
104b4('bum): gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi yang 'jig gten gi tha skad du btags pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rnam par/ 
104b5('bum): tha rad pa brgyad kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang 'jig gten/ gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i stong pa nyid
104b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang 'jig gtan
104b7('bum): gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang 'dzin
104b8('bum): gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// byams pa chen po yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// snying rje chen po yang 'jig rten
106a1('bum): gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o/ lan/ 
106a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// dgra' bcom pa nyid kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 
106a3('bum): rang byang chub kyang 'jig gten gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang 'jig gtan gi tha snyad du btags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'jig gnyen gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o// 
106a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos gang la yang 'di la bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ phan 'dogs pa 'am/ gnod par byed pa de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ chos
106a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin re yang ma dmyigs na/ sems dang po bskyed par 'gyur ba/ lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// sa bcu pa'i bar du dmyig/ 
106a6('bum): bar 'gyur ba lta ci stos te de ni gnas myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phye nad pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind/ 
106a7('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha lang tu na pa dang / bsam gtan go pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// nang stong pa nyid dmyigs
106a8('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci skyes te/ de ni gnas myed do// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stod pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / ngan dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma/ 
106b1('bum): phyis stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
106b2('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dmyigs par
106b3('bum): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed
106b4('bum): do/ dbang po lnga dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// stobs lnga dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas/ myed do// byang chub sems dpa' kyi yan lag bdun dmyigs
106b5('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dmyigs par
106b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// bsam gtan bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// tshad myed pa bzhi'i dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ gzugs/ 
106b7('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
106b8('bum): 'jug pa dag dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// mngon
107a1('bum): par shes pa rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs par 'gyur ba lA ci smos te/ de ni gnas skyed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs par
107a2('bum): 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dmyigs par 'gyur ba la ci smos te/ do na gnas myed de/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba ci smos te/ de ni
107a3('bum): gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// byams pa chen po dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// snying rje chen po dmyi/ 
107a4('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs/ 
107a5('bum): bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong 'i 'bras bu dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas mya do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs par 'gyur ba ci
107a6('bum): smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// dga' bcom pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rang byang chub dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// la ma gi rnam pa shes pa/ 
107a7('bum): nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a8('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do// / 
107b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// / shes rab
107b2('bum): dub bu tha ma bam po// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal
107b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid la bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum
107b4('bum): la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod pa dang / phigs pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes
107b5('bum): ba lnga la skyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa cu la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang
107b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs
107b7('bum): par bgyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i skal ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa/ 
107b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
108a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshen thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang sbyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po dang / len pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de dag las gzhan du yang myi spyod na
108a2('bum): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas
108a3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul
108a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
108a5('bum): chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa
108a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
108a7('bum): bathod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa mo skyed kyang / bzod pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang mi spyod na/ de'i mi byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po byang
108a8('bum): nub kyi la ma thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems depa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu sri da pa la de ltar srung na/ thobs mkhas pas zla na srid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu
108b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / 
108b2('bum): brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang
108b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab
108b4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / bsam gtan
108b5('bum): dngo / byamam gtan dung ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ ches de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ ro'i ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi la ma thob par 'gyur te/ 
108b6('bum): ra byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin pa shes rab kyi sa pa byen pa las dan/ mas pas tha sbe pa mya ga sas pa'i byang tshu me na pa tshigs par
108b7('bum): rab 'byer du gzhan yang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu pyod du pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes sa kyi ma du sbyin du pa sgos 'a/ shes pa dang / shes ba nga munas
108b8('bum): yang gyi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang gyi spyod na/ de'i ni byang chub sems dpo'i sems dpa chen po byang chub kyim mthos par 'gyur te/ rab 'byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dben
109a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
109a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid sgom yang / nang steng pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du
109a3('bum): yang myi skyed na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ 
109a4('bum): thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
109a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom yang mi pas/ chos de gnyis pang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid da sgom yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du
109a6('bum): yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lam/ thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
109a7('bum): de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
109a8('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid snyem yang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
109b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag
109b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom
109b3('bum): yang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam las thob/ 
109b4('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
109b5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom yang / chen
109b6('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid sgom yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byord
109b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar skyed na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// rab 'byor
109b8('bum): gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom yang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yang myi dmyi'o/ 
110a1('bum): chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
110a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/ 
110a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom yang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom yang myi dmigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang mi spyod na/ de'i
110a4('bum): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob/ da par 'gyur te/ rab 'byorarang byang chub sems dpa' sems de dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ 
110a5('bum): thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nga nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold
110a6('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom yang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sbrum pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang
110a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med/ 
110a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha'
110b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom yang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yang myi dmyigs/ chos de gnyis las gzhan du yang myi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems
110b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa yang /
