211b5('bum): sems can thams cad kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'a god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang
211b6('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// sems can thams cad kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched/ 
211b7('bum): la 'god do// mo la bdag nyid kyis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang yang dag par
211b8('bum): spong ba rnams sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
212a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang dbang po rnams sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis stobs
212a2('bum): rnas sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag
212a3('bum): rnams la 'god do// ma la bdag nyid kyis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'god do// ma la bdag
212a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma/ myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom par bya'o// sems can tham/ sa cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
212a5('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa la 'god do// snyam ste/ de ltar sems pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
212a6('bum): sangs rgyas po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad bsam gtan bzhi dang myi bral zhing / tshad myed pa bzhi dang myi bral ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub
212a7('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / myi bral bar shog shig/ ces bya bar sems skyed do// rab 'byor de ltar
212a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dog par bya'o// de nas bsam pa ya de dag thams cad yongs su
212b1('bum): rdzogs par byas kyi bar du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ sems can de dag thams
212b2('bum): kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/ de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/ sems can de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di
212b3('bum): lta ste/ bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
212b4('bum): kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/ ji nas kyang ngan song gsum du gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa ru gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / 'dod chags dang / 
212b5('bum): zhe sdang dang / gti mug tu gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa/ dang / bud myed dang / skyes par gdags pa'i mying yang myi sri da pa dang / theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid
212b6('bum): pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdog myed par gdogs pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gdogs pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdags pa'i
212b7('bum): mying yang myi srid pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang bar gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid pa dang / 'bras bur gdags pa'i mying yang myi srid cing / 
212b8('bum): gzhan du ni sems can de dag 'dod pa bzhin du/ shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/ phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i sgra dang / smon pa myed pa'i sgra dang / myi skye myi
213a1('bum): 'gag pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang / chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra byung ba dang / rgas de dag gi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
213a2('bum): rnams byung yang rung // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo // gang stong pa de la ni mtshan ma myed do// gang la mtshan ma myed pa de la ni smon pa
213a3('bum): myed do zhes bya bar chos thams cad bstan pa'i sgra nyin mtshan rgyun myi 'chad par 'gro yang rung / 'dug kyang rung sdod kyang rung / nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
213a4('bum): sbyong ngo // de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi kham/ sa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig// bzhags pa de dag thams cad legs par brjod par 'gyur te/ 
213a6('bum): sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa de the mas cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
213a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan na/ sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so// 'di ni chos ma yin no// zhes bya bar the tsom za bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos
213a8('bum): nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang myed de/ chos thams cad kyang chos so// de la sems can gang yang myi dge ba'i rtsa bas non po dang / sangs rgyas sam sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnam
213b1('bum): la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa myi dge ba'i gshes mnyen gis yongs su zin pa bdag tu lta bar bying ba nas/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba/ rtag pa 'am chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa log par 'dzin
213b2('bum): pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pA lu ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
213b3('bum): rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa la yang chos so zhes zer/ chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/ cha de dag chos spong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i
213b4('bum): rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa la yang / chos so zhes zer/ chos la yang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/ de de dag chos spong bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos spangs nas lus
213b5('bum): zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na myed pa yang
213b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par grol te/ de ltar rnam par grol
213b7('bum): nas/ nges pa'i phung por rab tu bkod de/ der bkod pa rnams phyin chad ngan song du ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
213b8('bum): dag par byed pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/ zag pa myed
214a1('bum): pa'i chos sam/ 'dus byas kyi chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang gnas par myi 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyuraro
214a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom
214a3('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi ba 'am/ ma nges zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
214a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ ma nges pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ nyan thos kyi phung po la/ ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am
214a5('bum): phung po gang du nges pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
214a6('bum): kyi phung por dris pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
214a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges shes bgyi 'am/ 'on tam phyir myi ldog pa des shes bgyi 'am/ 'on tam srid pa tha ma pa nges shes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang
214a8('bum): rab 'byor sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o// phyir myi ldog pa'i nges pa'o// srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
214b1('bum): nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye ba 'gyur ram/ myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor de nges pa'i byang chub sems
214b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du myi skye'o// rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ brgyad pa 'am rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs
214b3('bum): rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
214b4('bum): sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes
214b5('bum): rab sgom pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'i do// na du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas myed do// lha tshe rings po'i gnas su skye ba'i gnas myed do// gang na dge
214b6('bum): ba'i chos rnams myi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas myed do// glen pa dang lkugs par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do// mtha' khob kyi bla blo dang myi skyon zhing / 'khor bzhi rgyur myed pa'i
214b7('bum): yul du skye ba'i gnas myed do// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas myed do// gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgo myi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra myi drag pa dang / dge 'dun gi snga myi drag pa dang de ste bur skye
214b8('bum): gnas myod do// bya bo ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i gnas myong ngo do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang spyod pa nas nye bar bzung ste// blo na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
215a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems
215a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing tshul dang myi 'dra ba'i gnas su myi skye ba lags na/ gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi skye rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na de'i tshe/ 
215a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gi/ lus gang da
215a4('bum): gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin cing // rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems
215a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol seng gi skye gnas su skyes shing de la la la zhig bsod du 'ongs kyang bla na myed pa'i bzod par/ bdag yongs su gtong zhing sems can de dag la gnod par myi byed pa
215a6('bum): de lta bu thabs mkhas pa de dag dgra bcom po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grongs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po ni sems can rnaMs kyi phyir/ 
215a7('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du yang snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas myi gos par rig par bya
215a8('bum): gsoyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos thos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
215b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su rdzogs par myi bya ba chos de lta bu gang zhig yod de/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de ltar byang
215b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par myi bya ba myed do// dge ba'i ches gang yongs su
215b3('bum): rdzogs par byas par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu myed de de ni gnas ma yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
215b4('bum): pos sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i tshe sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/ de la slabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo// 
215b5('bum): bag chags kyi mtsha mos sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su rto / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa / 'a sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis
215b6('bum): pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa myed pa yin nam/ gsol pa
215b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing / zag pa myi mnga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
215b8('bum): pas byel song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing de mngon par sprul nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las de lta bu yod dam myed/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so// 
216a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de des de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta bu ma lags so// 
216a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ 
216a3('bum): lus de dag gis sems can rnams la ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa sprul pa mngon par sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing / las
216a4('bum): des gzhan gi dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab byer kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ ma ma che so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin
216a5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i cho/ sa zag pa myed pa dang / ldan pa ched du bsams shing / de lta bu/ 'i lus yongs su 'dzin to// ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rjes
216a6('bum): yongs su smin par byed do// de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du ye nga myi 'gyur to// sdug bsngal gi tshor ba yang nyams su myong ngo // rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma la sa
216a7('bum): glang po che'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sama'i/ glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam/ gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na// de dag glang po che'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzung
216a8('bum): sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
216b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i zag pa myed pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing / de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gi tshor bas
216b2('bum): 'gyur ba gang yang myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa de ltar ldan zhing / lus gang
216b3('bum): dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste/ de ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
216b4('bum): chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing / de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus myi gos par spyod pa la/ gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de shes
216b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thobs mkhas pa la spyod de/ thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i
216b6('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216b7('bum): pos gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ doni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams
216b8('bum): cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par myi byed do// stong pa nyid kyis chos la yang reg par myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang rig par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar/ 
217a1('bum): stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
217a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la myi gnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing / rnam pa de lta
217a3('bum): bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
217a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid kyis sto na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang
217a5('bum): yang khongs su chud pa 'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchi sa so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo // gsol pa
217a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
217a7('bum): 'das rnyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byod rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 
217a8('bum): de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// de nas me dang ldan parab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsoyangad to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba shes
217b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang / 
217b2('bum): 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge
217b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'grub pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
217b4('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'ji ga rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad
217b5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid mthong ngo // 'jig rten gi khams de dag nas/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sa/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa mthong ngo // 
217b6('bum): gzhan du na myang dang bdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/ gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rten go khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcom
217b7('bum): ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyu de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis myi stong pa zhig yin na ni/ nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyid che ba ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad
217b8('bum): chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par grub ste/ 
218a1('bum): mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / lha'i myig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa dang pha rol gi sems shes pa dang / sngon gi gnas dran pa dang / shi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes/ 
218a2('bum): pa ma skyed par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
218a3('bum): chen po'i byang chub tu ngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind par 'dus te/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis
218a4('bum): kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong na/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhon par 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad
218a5('bum): ni ngo bo nyid kyis steng pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing / ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba myed de/ stong / pi nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa myed do// 
218a6('bum): bam po / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i myig mngon par sgrub ste/ 
218a7('bum): lha'i myig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo// las de mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sems can nam sems/ 
218a8('bum): can du gdags par dmyigs pa myed do// de ltar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag
218b1('bum): na mad pa shes par byang chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed de// de lta'i rtsiganam par dag paskyems 'das pa byed kyis gar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mdzang me// de de dag tu rdzu zhu
218b2('bum): zhes so shIng / sbyin pa ma/ nus khrims sam/ bzod pa 'as/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsnam gtan nas/ shes raba'as// dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par snang ba rnams sam
218b3('bum): rdzu dzum na kyi rnathosasasu/ dbang ba rnams sam/ sangs rnams ma/ byang chu kyi lan paganams sas// phags pa'i mam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thang ba'i b+ha gang ba
218b4('bum): mitshan mi myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan nams dasam/ tshad myod pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ 
218b5('bum): de 'dzin rnams mam/ mjed kyis gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams sa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnamasas ma/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so mo yang dag par rig pa
218b6('bum): rnamam sas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sum/ na thos kyinas sam/ rangasangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos saso// sangs rgyas kyi chos sems can rnams kyi ngan byed
218b7('bum): sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus/ 
218b8('bum): na/ gzhan gi den lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag kyang bde bar gis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis/ 'phongs pas zil gis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song
219a1('bum): gsum las myi thar bar gyurd ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal
219a2('bum): ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ 
219a3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam
219a4('bum): gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ 
219a5('bum): de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs
219a6('bum): par gyur da na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nye du skye ba'i gnas yin gis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi
219a7('bum): go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la de skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le la ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 
219a8('bum): los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos to// le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar
219b1('bum): khyed ngan song gsum du srung na bdag cag kyang gnang bar gyinus na/ gzhan gdon pa ga ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbyed// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
219b2('bum): ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag le 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ sems g.yeng bas ni bdag gi don kyang
219b3('bum): myi nus gzhan gi den la lta ci smos/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du
219b4('bum): ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gnod par myi nus na/ gzhan gdo na pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems ladaga' tsam ya gi go skabs mye dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
219b5('bum): te re zhes chos ston te/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu da ga shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal
219b6('bum): pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar na shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig
219b7('bum): rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems ldan 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhos chos ston te// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de
219b8('bum): dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gauti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan
220a1('bum): pa zugs pa la spyod ba gan dgapa'i lam la / rnams kyi rnams// rangs su rgyas kyi ma/ rnam byu / 
220a2('bum): khyed chos gang ma mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni nga ba nyid kyis stong ste/ bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par nan par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid ma mngon par zhen pa rnyid do/ zhes
220a3('bum): ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// 
220a4('bum): de ltar myig rnam par dag po myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste// de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ 
220a5('bum): brgyan 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bas/ dron pa/ nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par stong ba rnams sa ma rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
220a6('bum): sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nga/ 
220a7('bum): bsam gtan nams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin nams sa ma nom pa da kyis gnos pa spongs/ 
220a8('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sos/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam ma ma pa rnamam sam/ na / 
220b1('bum): kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ sems can ser sna can
220b2('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig 'phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin
220b3('bum): pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ 'phongs pas zil gis non cing nyid sha mying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mya thar bar gyur te re zhes chos ston
220b4('bum): to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ci snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sku ngag bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang
220b5('bum): bya bar myi nus na gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pas rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi ste gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed
220b6('bum): ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag kyang gnod par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du
220b7('bum): gyur da ta re zhes chos ston te// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su mi byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par
220b8('bum): gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig
221a1('bum): rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can
221a2('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni seMs
221a3('bum): can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed
221a4('bum): kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// daphyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems na sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston/ 
221a5('bum): te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal po ste/ gang se mas g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ khyol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ 
221a6('bum): de ltar don song gsum du lhung na// bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa
221a7('bum): pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal te/ shes rab 'chal pas ni
221a8('bum): bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ 
221b1('bum): de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'argal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor spyod pa 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag
221b2('bum): myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag ni yang dag
221b3('bum): pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo
221b4('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon pa ru zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed de// zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
221b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can/ rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i myig rnam par dag
221b6('bum): myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gis song ste/ sbyin pa 'am// tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam
221b7('bum): bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bim// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul go rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam
221b8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam
222a1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 
222a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas
222a3('bum): kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de la dag la 'di skad
222a4('bum): du chos bston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang
222a5('bum): bde bar gis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ phongs pas zil gis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes ston to// sems can tshul khris
222a6('bum): ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pos ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos
222a7('bum): kyisatshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
222a8('bum): myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can
222b1('bum): phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi
222b2('bum): 'gyur te/ de bas na khyed phan pa tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur pa na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed
222b3('bum): kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos bstan te/ kye skyes bu dag
222b4('bum): le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smi na pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ 
222b5('bum): gagashin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lU nga na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi
222b6('bum): go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyurd ta re zhes ches ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 
222b7('bum): gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ 
222b8('bum): gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'go' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed
223a1('bum): bde dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes
223a2('bum): rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi gi skabs kyang
223a3('bum): myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyar ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// 
223a4('bum): gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'bral pa/ nyer 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ 
223a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor ni // de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyod chos gang la mngon pa ra zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste
223a6('bum): ngan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do// nas chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
223a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lho'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyog
223a8('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ brjod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ zhes rab bgro// 
223b1('bum): dra banye bar gnag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par stong pa rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi nang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lan
223b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
223b3('bum): pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa
223b4('bum): rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sa
223b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing // sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la ser sna can gang rje skyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs
223b6('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 'phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan go don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gos shig/ 
223b7('bum): gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang
223b8('bum): ci snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis
224a1('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas snyam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus
224a2('bum): na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta ra zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems
224a3('bum): su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos bstan te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ 
224a4('bum): de lta bas ni khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur nas/ som sa can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis
224a5('bum): bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs dang myi dbye'o// phyi sa 'gyod pa pa can du gyur ta ri zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
224a6('bum): du chos bstan te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ 
224a7('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'dzeg rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cig kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis
224a8('bum): li lo'i sems 'ga' tsam ge go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems gsong ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes pa/ 
224b1('bum): dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin po ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song / 
224b2('bum): gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
224b3('bum): zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'tshal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag
224b4('bum): gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dam dal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig
224b5('bum): rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ag 'a tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can
224b6('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ci snyed pa de dag byams po la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// 
224b7('bum): lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam le sbyor to// nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos
224b8('bum): gang la mngon par zhen pa'i gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do// zhes
225a1('bum): chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams/ 
225a2('bum): kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de lnga'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
225a3('bum): thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shos rab bam// / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
225a4('bum): rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi/ rgung pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
225a5('bum): brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mye da pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
225a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sa ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 
225a7('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam// nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ 
225a8('bum): byang chub ses dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing // sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston/ 
225b1('bum): sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gis shig
225b2('bum): gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ phongs pas zil gis non cing nying sha mying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re/ zhes chos ston to/ sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed
225b3('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul
225b4('bum): khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dbyil song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang
225b5('bum): gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khye da kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 
225b6('bum): sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos
225b7('bum): gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan phu tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol seng gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye/ 
225b8('bum): ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyed po can du gyur ta re zhes bya bar chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa
226a1('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can
226a2('bum): dmyal ba 'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdin lta ci smos te/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos
226a3('bum): kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis lo lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyed pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
226a4('bum): ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ 
226a5('bum): de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gnod pa/ ra myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khye da kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbyen
226a6('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shi sa rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shos
226a7('bum): rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
226a8('bum): yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi
226b1('bum): sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lan ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de
226b2('bum): dag yang dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyod chos gang mngon par zhen
226b3('bum): par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do// zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na
226b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol / tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gan/ sa shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// lha'i myig
226b5('bum): rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gri khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims
226b6('bum): bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnaMs
226b7('bum): sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ 
226b8('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
227a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
227a2('bum): sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ 
227a3('bum): de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos
227a4('bum): kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ phongs pas zil gis non cing / nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyurapa
227a5('bum): ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang // ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni
227a6('bum): bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyi sa/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
227a7('bum): yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan seng gsum du lhung ni bdag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'gra' tsam gri go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// 
227a8('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can yon tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ci snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod semaso su ma byed cig/ 
227b1('bum): sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba
227b2('bum): 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems
227b3('bum): can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin
227b4('bum): pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum/ du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa
227b5('bum): lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag
227b6('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
227b7('bum): yin te/ de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis go yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi ge skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis
227b8('bum): 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab tuchal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas/ 
228a1('bum): ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ 
228a2('bum): de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// 
228a3('bum): zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag par
228a4('bum): lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi// lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di ska da du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa
228a5('bum): de dag gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhi na pa myed do zhes ston to// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa'
228a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid
228a7('bum): kyis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams mthong ste/ de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ 
228a8('bum): shes rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so
228b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/ 
228b2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs/ 
228b3('bum): pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs
228b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can ca rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig 'phongs pas
228b5('bum): sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis/ sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gos shig/ gzhan yang
228b6('bum): bode bar gis shig/ phongs pas zil gis non cing / nying sha nyid gos zos te ngan seng gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan can gang ji snyed pa de dag
228b7('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gidon kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par
228b8('bum): smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos
229a1('bum): kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur
229a2('bum): pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de bas na khyed phan tshun sems
229a3('bum): 'khrugs par gyur pa na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang
229a4('bum): myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te rau/ zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos s+ho/ na te/ kye skyes bu dag la lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag
229a5('bum): gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas som/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan
229a6('bum): song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes
229a7('bum): chos ston to// sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am
229a8('bum): byol song gi skye nas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis// de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'o sems
229b1('bum): 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa
229b2('bum): khro ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pa ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gdon lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam
229b3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyad pa can gang
229b4('bum): ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// 
229b5('bum): lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag par sbyor te// nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'amasangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te
229b6('bum): khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni me ngon par zhon par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed de
229b7('bum): zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa
229b8('bum): yin te/ de lta'i myig nam por dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ nub byang gi phyogs marnams kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing sbyin pa'am tshul khrim
230a1('bum): som/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab ba pa// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnamaso som/ yang dag par skyong ba rnams sem/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnas sam
230a2('bum): dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smin pa
230a3('bum): myed pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam
230a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnas sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju dag pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam da mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnas
230a5('bum): sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can
230a6('bum): rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni
230a7('bum): bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gis shig/ gzhon yang bde bar gis shig/ 'phongs pas zil gis non cing
230a8('bum): nyid sha nying gis zos te/ don song gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan
230b1('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam
230b2('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gri
230b3('bum): go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re/ zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig/ 
230b4('bum): gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur rad na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ 
230b5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i// sems 'ga' tsam gri go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod
230b6('bum): pa can du gyur ro ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang dza stod pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar/ 
230b7('bum): myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas som/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag
230b8('bum): cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can
231a1('bum): sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ 
231a2('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te / de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gnod par mi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i seMs
231a3('bum): 'gra' tsam go go skabs kyang myi dbyer// phyis 'gyod pa can duH/ nad ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal btson gang ji sred pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kyo skyes bu dag shes rab
231a4('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shos rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don/ kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes/ rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am
231a5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten te/ de ltar khyod kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa tsam du gyur da ta re zhos chos ston to// 
231a6('bum): 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung
231a7('bum): ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing // de dag la 'di skad du chos
231a8('bum): ston to// khyed chos gang la zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do// zhes chos
231b1('bum): ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ma yin no// 
231b2('bum): de lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag gis chu rdzu 'phrul gis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod
231b3('bum): pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ 
231b4('bum): stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phag sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan
231b5('bum): rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i sgo/ mas par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sa/ ma/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
231b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sa ma/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos rnams
231b7('bum): sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa
231b8('bum): pade dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag
232a1('bum): kyang bde bar gis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gis shig/ phongs par zil gis non cing nyid sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can
232a2('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan
232a3('bum): gi don lta ci smos te/ gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa na sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ 
232a4('bum): bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan po'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes
232a5('bum): chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ci stod pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de lta/ ra khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrug
232a6('bum): par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur/ te/ de bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ se mas can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ 
232a7('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod do// dri ni khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi gau skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod po can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo
232a8('bum): ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems ma/ 
232b1('bum): dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis
232b2('bum): le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi ge skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da te re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes
232b3('bum): bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan
232b4('bum): song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi/ nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyi/ nos g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbya'o// phyis
232b5('bum): 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal patsun gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 
232b6('bum): shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje/ 
232b7('bum): 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed
232b8('bum): pa de dag myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par
233a1('bum): zhugs pa'i spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor ro// nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ 
233a2('bum): khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do zhes chos ston
233a3('bum): to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// / 
233a4('bum): shes rab / bam pa / de lha'i myi grwa rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pa de nyid kyis steng gi phyogs
233a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu/ 'phrul gis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes
233a6('bum): rab bam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong po rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam
233a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i
233a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam
233b1('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ 
233b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs
233b3('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi drin kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lo ci smos te/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gos shig/ gzhan yang bong bar gis shig/ 
233b4('bum): phongs pas zil gis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song / gsum las myi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la chos ston te/ 
233b5('bum): kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khri mas ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sras
233b6('bum): can dmyal ba 'am/ byos song gi skye gnas sem/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du spring na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta tsa mas kyis/ de'i
233b7('bum): khyed kyis nul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can pon tshun gnod sems su gyur du pa dzi stod pa de dag lo 'di
233b8('bum): skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su mo byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed pan tshun sems 'khrun
234a1('bum): par gyur na sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// 
234a2('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'od skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na
234a3('bum): gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byel song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
234a4('bum): myi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems
234a5('bum): g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.ye nga ba'i rnam par smin pa ni// sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas/ 
234a6('bum): sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na/ gzhan gdan pA ma nas na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems/ 
234a7('bum): 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa
234a8('bum): ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ 
234b1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag
234b2('bum): myi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod po can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan por zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa
234b3('bum): pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor to// nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos
234b4('bum): de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa myed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
234b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa/ rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yi/ na no// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon
234b6('bum): par shes par shes pa rnams la ma gnas pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan par myi nus te/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du bzud par myi nus so// rab 'byor da 'di
234b7('bum): lta ste dper na/ bya 'dab ma myed pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar myi nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma rten par sems can rnams la ches
234b8('bum): ston par myi nus so// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes
235a1('bum): pa mngon par sgrubs pas de dag gis sems kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// des lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu
235a2('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems sems kyis khongs su chud par byas shing / de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ 
235a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos
235a4('bum): ston to// des lha'i myig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can/ gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang
235a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dag mthun par spyi/ na pa'i gtam 'o ma/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gte
235a6('bum): 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam le/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gri bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis nub
235a7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag
235a8('bum): gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas shing // de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtom 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ 
235b1('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag/ 
235b2('bum): tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag mthong zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin
235b3('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i btam 'am/ 'byung
