235b4('bum): ba'i gtam gri bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis byang sha nga gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste da mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag
235b5('bum): kyang mthong ste/ de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song bas sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chu da par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'amo// tshul khris
235b6('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to/ 
235b7('bum): des lha'i myig gis shan lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu
235b8('bum): 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus
236a1('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
236a2('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi bye ma snyed mthe
236a3('bum): sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas shing / de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab
236a4('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i 'den pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
236a5('bum): mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mtho ngango // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ 
236a6('bum): de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am// brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 
236a7('bum): 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang go'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // 
236a8('bum): de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems bya sems kyis/ khong du chud par byas shing / de dang mthun pa'i sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod/ 
236b1('bum): pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i myig steng/ 
236b2('bum): gri phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing / 
236b3('bum): sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
236b4('bum): gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'jigs pa'i dren pa'i gtam 'tsho/ 'byung ba'i gtam go bar du chos ston te// de lha'i rna ba'i khams kyi 'di lta ste/ lha dang myi gnyis ka'i sgra yang / 
236b5('bum): thos te/ de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi/ bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston te/ de dag gi chos lha rna bas nyan te// thos nas
236b6('bum): kyang bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
236b7('bum): gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
236b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rnabs nyan to// thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin po'i/ 
237a1('bum): 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtam gi gautam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am
237a2('bum): 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos ston pa
237a3('bum): de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi
237a4('bum): gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi ga ta ma 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar
237a5('bum): du chos ston to// de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khra mas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi tshe/ sa lha'i rnabs nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin
237a6('bum): to// de bzhin du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnam sa la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi sata ma 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam
237a7('bum): 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
237a8('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du
237b1('bum): bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ 
237b2('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
237b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 
237b4('bum): sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bas/ ma gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags
237b5('bum): po'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du tshe sa ston to// de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
237b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/ 
237b7('bum): de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzed pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am
237b8('bum): shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam 'am/ gi bar du chos ston to// de nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
238a1('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du
238a2('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi
238a3('bum): gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston te// de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
238a4('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la ches
238a5('bum): te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzed pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 
238a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
238a7('bum): ji snyed cig chos ston te pa de lha'i rnabs nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin du bzung nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i rnas 'am// tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am
238a8('bum): brjod pa'i gtam ya/ badzin grus kyig ma ya/ dasam gtan gig ma ma// shes rab kyi gi ma 'am/ rapags pa'i dzin pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos zin to// mam
238b1('bum): kyi rnam grangs shes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhin du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ 
238b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar
238b3('bum): du chos ston to// de bdag dang gzhan gi sngon gi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gi gnas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238b4('bum): sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo ngo / bar zhes bya bar shes te/ de sems can sngon gri ga/ nas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ci snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa
238b5('bum): nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gta ma 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 
238b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden po'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
238b7('bum): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems sems can rnams la ches ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i
238b8('bum): gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// de zag pa myed pa'i mngon du bya ba'i shes pa
239a1('bum): bzhin du rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin rdzodrug pa des sems can rnams ma chos stonate/ sbyin pa'i gtam ram/ nub khrims kyi gtam 'am
239a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am// shes rab kyi gtam
239a3('bum): 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston to// rab 'byed de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i rtsa
239a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mdo nu par shes pa shin tu 'dres pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su bzung bar 'dod pa de dang / de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung
239a5('bum): zhing / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal de dag gis gos myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
239a6('bum): pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni dgongs pa thams cad byed kyang / bde bo 'am sdug bsngal des gos par 'gyur ba myed de// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
239a7('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du// chos ston kyang bde ba 'am sdug bsngal
239a8('bum): des 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang
239b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
239b2('bum): ma byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gi yan lag
239b3('bum): dang myi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' se dang dpa' chen po
239b4('bum): la mo gi yan log yongs su rdzogs par gis shig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags bcom ldan
239b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos tha mas cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'i lam gi yan lag go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam
239b6('bum): gi yan lag gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gi yan la ga dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
239b7('bum): stsal pa/ sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 
239b8('bum): 'di la ni yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis ni sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
240a1('bum): lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing tshul khrims srung ba
240a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag gis tshul khrims srung ngo // 'di'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis
240a3('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la
240a4('bum): myi rtog cing bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa sgom par bya'o// 'di ni don du sgom par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag las myi rtog pa ste/ 
240a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
240a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing de brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsom mo// 'di'i
240a7('bum): don du brtson 'grus brtsom mo/ zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag
240a8('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing de la bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid
240b1('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// 'di'i don du bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// 'di'i don du bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// zhes
240b2('bum): gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ bsam gtan gi pha ro lang tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
240b3('bum): dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis shes rab
240b4('bum): sgom mo// 'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo/ zhes gsum po de ga la myi rtog ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis ba dag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi
240b5('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung nga ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di
240b6('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing
240b7('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skye ba nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
240b8('bum): kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sbrel zhing
241a1('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de dag la myi gtong cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom
241a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ phyi nang
241a3('bum): stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
241a4('bum): la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi sa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 
241a5('bum): 'di'i don du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 2/ khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan
241a6('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni
241a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
241a8('bum): ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing don dam/ 
241b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid// bdag gis don pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du don po stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la
241b2('bum): myi rtog pa ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
241b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom
241b4('bum): par bya'o// 'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes ga sum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ga gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol
241b5('bum): ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge bo'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing 'dus ma byas
241b6('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'du sa mo byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di ni don du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ 
241b7('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa
241b8('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha'o las
242a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mtha' las 'das
242a2('bum): ye stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lamo gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
242a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ma stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog ma dang tha
242a4('bum): ma myed pa stong po nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du thog mo dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rta ga pa ste/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag
242a5('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye ba ra bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod
242a6('bum): kyang de la myi rtog cing / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dor ba myed pa
242a7('bum): stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos sems dang po
242a8('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 
242b1('bum): bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mod pa'o// zhes gsum mo de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
242b2('bum): zhing skyes gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gau yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / chos
242b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du chos thams
242b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid sgom mo/ zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa skye/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhon yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan
242b5('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
242b6('bum): sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtsha na nyid stong pa nyid do dag kyi gas rnam rgyas na rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan
242b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos myi dmyigs pa
242b8('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom par
243a1('bum): bya'o// 'di'i don du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam
243a2('bum): gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid
243a3('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid de// bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de
243a4('bum): dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ga nga gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gau yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
243a5('bum): dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni ngo bo nyid
243a6('bum): stong pa nyid do// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang
243a7('bum): 'khor ba las sbrum 'aM/ gzhan sang sprul ba 'di ni mamyo g.yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang bskyed pa nas ra dzung na/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa ring bo nyid nga
243a8('bum): pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bdag gis dngos po
243b1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'gro/ 
243b2('bum): baM las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang che po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i chos
243b3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// 
243b4('bum): bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag
243b5('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'dini lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed/ pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
243b6('bum): po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtag cing yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// 
243b7('bum): bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mya rtog pa ste/ yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba
243b8('bum): las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lamo gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu
244a1('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul
244a2('bum): gi rkang pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rdzu 'phrul gi rkang po rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
244a3('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing dbang po
244a4('bum): lnga sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni da brang po rnams so// bdag gis dbang po rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dbang po rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog
244a5('bum): pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol cing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems
244a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyi sa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni stobs rnams so// bdag gi stobs
244a7('bum): rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du stobs sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i
244a8('bum): chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
244b1('bum): sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom par sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom mo// 
244b2('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog me pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas
244b3('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i tshe
244b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa sgom par bya'o// 'di 'din du 'phags
244b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol
244b6('bum): ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing
244b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du
244b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// 
245a1('bum): sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / bsam gtan rnams sgom pa'i tshe
245a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du bsam gtan rnams sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste
245a3('bum): bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245a4('bum): chen po'i dge'i chos tshad myed pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog/ cing tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni tshad myed pa rnams so// bdag gis tshad myed
245a5('bum): pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du tshad myed pa rnams sgo/ ma mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshad myed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
245a6('bum): ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod
245a7('bum): kyang de la myi rtog cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa bzhi rnams so// bdag
245a8('bum): gis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog cing / gzugs
245b1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
245b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par thar pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni
245b3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad do// bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rnam par thar pa sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rnam par tha rad pa
245b4('bum): brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
245b5('bum): bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing
245b6('bum): mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// 
245b7('bum): bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la
245b8('bum): myi rtag pa ste/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i cho so// sems dang po bskyed
246a1('bum): padas nye par 'du she chu ba sems dpa sems dpa' chen pa dge pa yongs dum ngag dang gro song ba pa dang / mtshanas med pa nga sto dpa skyed pa la spyod krung de la gyi nog cing / rnam pa sad
246a2('bum): 'i sgo stong pa nyid nga mtshan sa skyed pa dang slo spyod pa dang / spyod pa skyeng pa sgom phyi'i che/ ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni rnam pa mngo ba ma mang pa nyid du mtshan pa myed pa dang sman parnams so// bdag
246a3('bum): dum na kyi gyi thos su / du mams shing du sa sa nga gyu sa khyo ma sa
246a4('bum): na 'i nang pa'i sa mnam stong slo myed pa ga gas padu kyang pa'i b.las sprul zhing gzhan pa dkrol pa da sum ge ya lag dge s+ho// sems
246b1('bum): sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du ting nge 'dzinang rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi man lag dge ba'i chos so// 
246b2('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing gzungs kyi
246b3('bum): sgo rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams snyam par bya'o// 'di'i don du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rto/ 
246b4('bum): pa ste/ de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
246b5('bum): ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa de la mi rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i chongo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni/ de bzhin
246b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu skam par bya'o// 'di'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ 
246b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang gyis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
246b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// 
247a1('bum): bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mi 'jigs pa rnams skom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan
247a2('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa
247a3('bum): ma nog cing so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ than cad kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bdag gis so so yang dag par rig
247a4('bum): ba rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
247a5('bum): zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i// chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen
247a6('bum): bo la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing / snying rje chen po sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni snying rje chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du snying rje chen
247a7('bum): bo sgom gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
247a8('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
247b1('bum): bco brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du sangs rgyas
247b2('bum): kyi chas ma 'dres pa rnams pasgom mo zhes gsum po dag ma mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan sa gang ni
247b3('bum): ba'i chos so// rab 'byorang dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam nges 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang ltar gyi byang chub sems
247b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad myed pa des de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang rgal bar 'gyur pa ste/ lam des yongs su rdzogs par byas shing
247b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// 
247b6('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te// sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yon no// / shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyal ba las
247b7('bum): dedas me dang ldan pa' 'a 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dis ses gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das ga' ta chos de dag bya chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags
248a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor nga gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byorang sangs
248a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar zad de de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub
248a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad glacig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol mngon
248a4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
248a5('bum): rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs pa yang gzhan la 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma mchis zhes myi bya'o// / 
248a6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na par tshad byed pa'i bar du zhugs pa yin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang de ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad la slob pa
248a7('bum): byed pa'i sashes banos pa ste/ rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab byar
248a8('bum): chos gso mangs/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyi chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'din byol song gyi sde
248b1('bum): gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lnga'o// 'di'i phyi'i/ 'di'i ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyunang tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir/ 
248b2('bum): mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar
248b3('bum): khyad par dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin
248b4('bum): du las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de de babazhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 
248b5('bum): chos thams cad rang gyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byoragang gyis rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma
248b6('bum): shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa'am/ legs par spyad pa'am/ myi g.yo' ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyang ba'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo // legs par spyad pa'i
248b7('bum): mas kyis lnga dang myir skye'o// nyams pa skyed pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa'
248b8('bum): chen ma na sbyin po pa'i lang tu phyind pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rolang tu byon pa la spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ro bod du phyin pa la spang
249a1('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
249a2('bum): spyad/ rkyen pa phreng pa nyid sa spyad/ de ngan pa stong panyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong bshi la snang / 'dus sa byas spong sa nyid sa byung / mtha' las 'das pa ma ma nyid bskyed/ thogs pa
249a3('bum): da pa nang shing yang / deng byed pa stong shing sa dang / dzin stong nyid sa nga sa sa stong nyid pa spyang / kyis tsha slong shings yang / myigs
249a4('bum): nyings srung / dngas bskyed pa stong nyid lasnang / ni spong zhi spyad/ sa pa gyid ge sbyong nyid smad/ phyid bge bar gzhag pa rnams la spong / yang dag par spong ban
249a5('bum): la spyod/ chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la skyeng / dbang gi rnams la spyod/ stobs rnams la spyod/ byang chu kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ 
249a6('bum): pas snang / 'phags para'i bdod pa rnamasas snang/ mas gtad mas stong / chad byed pa ni mas da/ gzugs myed pa ma la dug pa rnams
249b1('bum): spyad so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad/ snying rje chen po la spyad / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad la spyod/ nyams myed pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed pa nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
249b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag 'khor ba dang ldan pa la mnyam gzhag cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems
249b3('bum): can rnams kyi don byedade/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud zos shing rgyud lnga 'khor bar mi ltung bar de ltar don byed do// gsol dab/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa
249b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang / rab 'byor ma yin no// 
249b5('bum): gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am dkar po'am/ gnag pa/ 'am/ dkar ba'am/ mi gnag/ mi kar ba dmigs
249b6('bum): legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gyi skye
249b7('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lha dang mir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar chags pa mdzad/ phyir mi 'ong bar ji ltar rtags pa mdzad/ dra bcom par ji ltar rtags
249b8('bum): pa mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar rtags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags ba mdza
250a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da ji sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
250a2('bum): su la pa/ rab 'byor da gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
250a3('bum): byang chub tu myi 'jug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams mi 'grol te/ rab 'byor sems can de dag chos
250a4('bum): rnams rang gi mtshan nyid gis stong par myi shes na/ myi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
250a5('bum): 'das de dag las/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis s+ho// nga bar thos nas/ sems can rnams gi don dubla na myedapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di/ 
250a6('bum): dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni myed cing yang dag pa mayin par chos rnams la yod par brtags shing / sems can
250a7('bum): myed pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba myed pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ 'du shes myed pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du byed myed pa la 'du byed du shes bla rnam
250a8('bum): par shes pa myed pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ myig myed pa la myig du 'du shes/ rna ba myed pa la rna bar 'du shes/ sna myed pa la sngar 'du shes/ lce myed pa la lcer 'du shes/ lus myed pa la lus su
250b1('bum): 'du shes/ yid myed pa la yid du 'du shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra myed pa la sgrar 'du shes/ dri myed pa la drir 'du shes/ ro myed pa la ror 'du shes/ reg myed pa la reg du 'a
250b2('bum): shes/ chos myed pa la chos su 'du shes/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa la myig gi rnam par 'du shes/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myed
250b3('bum): pa la sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus gi rnam par shes pa myed pa la lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ ying gi rnam par shes pa
250b4('bum): myed pa la yid gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ myig gi 'dus te/ reg pa myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes rna ba'i 'ad dus te reg pa myed pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes sna'i 'dus
250b5('bum): te reg pa myed pa la sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lce'i 'du sa te reg pa myed pa la lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lusakyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes
250b6('bum): ying gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed
250b7('bum): pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
250b8('bum): ba myed pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus
251a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes// sa'i khams myed pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams myed pa la chu'i khams su 'du shes/ me'i khams
251a2('bum): myed pa la me'i khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams myed pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa la nam mkha'i khams su 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa la rnam par shes pa'i
251a3('bum): khams su 'du shes// ma rig pa myed pa la ma rig par 'du shes/ 'du byed myed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ mying dang gzugs myed pa lo mying dang gzugs su 'ju/ 
251a4('bum): shesaskye mched drug myed pa la skye mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa med bra la reg par 'du shes/ tshor ba myed pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ sred pa myed pa la sred par 'du shes/ len pa myed pa la 'du shes
251a5('bum): srid pa myed pa la srid par 'du shes/ skye ba myed pa la 'du shes/ rga shi myed pa la rga shir 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos myed pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las
251a6('bum): 'das pa'i chos myed pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos myed pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa myed pa'i chos la zag pa myed pa'i chos su
251a7('bum): shes 'dus byas kyi chos myed pa lnga 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos myed pa la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang / 
251a8('bum): ldan pa rnams/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su myi 'grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
251b1('bum): rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par/ 
251b2('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to// shes rab
251b3('bum): bam po / rab 'byor kyis gsolang ba gal te chos thams cad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
251b4('bum): pa lags na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs parasangs rgyas te/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams
251b5('bum): yongs su 'gyel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chu
251b6('bum): mngon po rdzogs pad+ma sangs rgyas te/ sgeg pasngos pa dang / sdug bsdus spyan 'byung ba dang // sdug byas la 'gog pa dang / sdug bsdus 'gog par pa las sems rgya rnams mcho / 
251b7('bum): du/ ga go/ NU glos s+ho// rnas par 'gro / sim // yang dag par // 'phags pa 'i dzin pa ni pa dge ba'i chos byung chu hU~M phyogs pa
251b8('bum): sa pa 'i tshig sa mi pa ga kyi'i thams cang ses su u / seMs rgyas ga'i mchog dgi chos gan ma chog dgi ge sa tsun po tshogag sa kyi gcos
252a1('bum): can rnams las rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol lo// rab 'byor kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ra/ 
252a2('bum): bon te sdug bsngal gis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'ond te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gos
252a3('bum): ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on
252a4('bum): lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yo dngas su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang
252a5('bum): ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi
252a6('bum): 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su myi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mnyam
252a7('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ba ma yin no// sdug bsngal gis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas
252a8('bum): yongs su mya ngan las/ 'da' ba ma yin/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// 
252b1('bum): lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gis kyang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis// sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang
252b2('bum): ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal ba yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i
252b3('bum): bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang
252b4('bum): gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi gan sa nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs
252b5('bum): pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings chos kyi dbyings myi nyam mi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
252b6('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya de bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes/ 
252b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji ltar spyad na/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ci ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/ khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung zhing
252b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
253a1('bum): chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmyigs su myed pa/ de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmyigs pas/ bden par rtogs pa 'am/ bden par rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong // 
253a2('bum): ste/ des de ltar mthong nas/ skyon myed par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur do nas spyi bor ltung bar
253a3('bum): mi 'gyur te/ de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba myed do// de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi sa la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo// tshad myed pa bzhi bsgrub bo// gzugs
253a4('bum): myedad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/ de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do// de sdug bsngal
253a5('bum): yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmyigs pa'i sems mi skyed // kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang / kun 'byung ba la dmyigs mi bskyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la
253a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// lam sgom yang lam la dmyigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du
253a7('bum): byed pa mthong ba byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do// gsol pa
253a8('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sel pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ de rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o// zheHsa bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid ga
253b1('bum): la gnas shing / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyabar bya ba de lta bu'i/ jom nyid chos gang la yang yod pa mi mthong ngo // dngos po skyed pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas pa mdzad/ rang sa sa
253b2('bum): rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pas ma byas/ phyir mi 'ong bas ma byas/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ rgyun tu zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la zhe spyod pa'i byang
253b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/ gzhan du yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis mi shes mi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
253b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems/ can rnams la chos sto na to// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi tsu pA pa las// 
253b5('bum): le'u bdun cu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoradakyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da ta// bcom ldan
253b6('bum): 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/ phyir mi 'ong bas ma bgyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong
253b7('bum): bas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'ibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ 
253b8('bum): chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal bar/ 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di dag ni lha'o// 'di dag ni mi'o// las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
254a1('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur// las 'dis ni myir 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ltar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum go lha
254a2('bum): 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mtshe ma'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dga' ldan gi lhar 'gyur/ las 'dis ni 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis
254a3('bum): ni tshangs ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis na tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs chen kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'das ni snang ba'i
254a4('bum): lhar 'gyur// las 'dis na chung snang gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshad myed snang ba'i ltar 'gyuro// las 'dis ni kun snang dang ba'i lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur// las 'dis
254a5('bum): ni chung dge'i lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni tshad myed dge ba'i lhar 'gyu ro// las 'dis na rga rgyas gi lhar 'gyur/ las 'dis ni ba'i lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni chung che'i ltar 'gyur ro lnga/ 
254a6('bum): 'dis ni tshad myed che ba'i lhar 'gyur/ las 'das ni 'bras bu che ba'i lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni myi che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni myi gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha/ 
254a7('bum): 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gya nom snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'og myin gi ltar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yos skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha'
254a8('bum): yas skye mched gi ltar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mchod gi lhar 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras gyur
254b1('bum): 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyu ro// las 'dis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni dgra bcom par 'gyuraro// las 'dis ni rang sa
254b2('bum): rgya su 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyu ro zhes bgyi
254b3('bum): ba tha dad du dbye ba 'am/ rnam par dgod pa yang ci ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la yang de bzhin gshegs bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sos can
254b4('bum): dmyal bar mchi'am/ byol sod kyi skye gnasu mchi 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi'am/ myir skye 'am/ lhar skye 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye 'am/ su cu rtsa gsu
254b5('bum): gi wAr skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ rga ldan gilhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul rga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phru la dbang byed kyi lhar skye 'am/ tshangs ri si lgar skye ba 'am
254b6('bum): tshangs lnga nye pan gaM lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhur skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba
254b7('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge pa'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhur skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am// che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar
254b8('bum): skye ba'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'o// mi che ba'i lhar skye ba'i// mye gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba'o// gya nom snang ba ltar skye 'i kyi
255a1('bum): gyi lhar skye ba 'i/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du she
255a2('bum): myed myin skye mched gi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob
255a3('bum): bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thob par
255a4('bum): gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongasu dgrol bar/ 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
255a5('bum): 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byord sa po myed pa la ni las kyang myed/ bya ba yang myed 'bras bu
255a6('bum): yang myed na/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du myi shes te/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs
255a7('bum): mngon par 'du byed pas yul sna tshogs pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am byol song gyi skye gnas so/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mya 'am rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i// 
255a8('bum): sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mche ma'i lha 'am dga' ldan gyi lha'i/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lha 'am tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i/ tshangs pa kun 'grom
255b1('bum): gi lha 'am/ tshangs chen gi lha 'am/ snang ba'i lha 'am/ chung snang gi lha 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lha 'am/ dge ba'i lha 'am/ chung dge'i lha 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha 'am
255b2('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha 'am/ che ba'i lha 'am/ chung che'i lha 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lha 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/ myi che ba'i lha 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lha 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i
255b3('bum): lha 'am/ 'og myin gi lha 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed
255b4('bum): myin skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po myed pa la ni las sam bya ba 'am 'bras bu myed de/ dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa nyid do// rab 'byor de de la 'di
255b5('bum): skad du dngos po myed pa la bya ba gang yang myed do// bya ba ga/ nga gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye nye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ 
255b6('bum): myir skye ba 'am lhor skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris su skye ba maHsum bcu rtsa gsum gi ltar skye ba 'am/ 'tshe ma'i lhor skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am
255b7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am// tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lta nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen go lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye
255b8('bum): ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'om/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am
256a1('bum): dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung
256a2('bum): ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye bo 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas/ 
256a3('bum): skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan
256a4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am
256a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam lo spyod pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba la ma/ de thob pas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongasu
256a6('bum): dgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang myed do// zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lam dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam
256a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rang byang chub dngos po myed pa ma yin
256a8('bum): nam lcam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po myod pa ma yin nam/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lam gi dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rgyun tu zhug
256b1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// 
256b2('bum): rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
256b3('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po myed pa'i chos shig dngos po myed pa'i chos thob par byed snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
256b4('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na dngos po myed pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang / ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa myed
256b5('bum): pa mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
256b6('bum): mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhon pa/ myi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su
256b7('bum): gyur pa/ myi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par grol te// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byis
256b8('bum): pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la dngos po'o zhes nas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis na ni mngon par
257a1('bum): 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ srog las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ji ste myi 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang
257a2('bum): la gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam yang myed do// rab 'byor de de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs/ 
257a3('bum): tshul dang / thabs mkhas bas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyed la dbye ba bshad do// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam du mthong ba la rmyi lam de gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su
257a4('bum): spyod pa de lta bu'i dang sa po gang yang yod dam/ gas lad pa bcom ldan 'das rmi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na// rmi lam mthong ba de la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod/ 
257a5('bum): pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bka' stsald pa// rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang
257a6('bum): bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten
257a7('bum): las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa ma mchis pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
257a8('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rmi lam rgyud lngar 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam/ 
257b1('bum): la lam sgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das/ 
257b2('bum): ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ brjod pa dang tshig dang sgra dang yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ me 'o la
257b3('bum): gzugs brnyan snang ba de gang las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am
257b4('bum): myi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol/ da pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma logs so// bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du byis pa rnams la slu ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma
257b5('bum): mchis te/ gzugarnardzas brnyan gis kyang ma mchis na/ gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis pas/ sem/ sa can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol seng gi skye gnas su mchi
257b6('bum): ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
257b7('bum): gang de la lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan
257b8('bum): nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ lam sgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ ma mchis so// 
258a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems pa/ nags stug po dang / cong rong dang / lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na/ sgra rnyan de las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas nas
258a2('bum): sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ lha dang myir 'gyur ba lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
258a3('bum): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra rnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyis na/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas
258a4('bum): su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ lha dang myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dgo' ldan
258a5('bum): gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul do/ bang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor
258a6('bum): gi lhar skyo ba 'am/ tshangs chen gi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang sna ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar
258a7('bum): skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i
258a8('bum): lhor skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
258b1('bum): kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// 
258b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan gi lam gang la sgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam
258b3('bum): bsgoms pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags na/ lam gang la sgoms pas kyang kun nas nyon mongs par yang
258b4('bum): myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba'i lam sgom pa lta/ smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// smrig
258b5('bum): rgyu la chu myed par chu'i 'du shes su gyur pa dang / klung myed klung gi 'du she sa su gyur pa dang / grong khyer myed par grong khyer gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang / skyed mos tshal myed par skyed mos tshal gi 'du shes
258b6('bum): su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myor skye ba 'am/ rgyal
258b7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'tsho ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhor skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am
258b8('bum): tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar
259a1('bum): skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye
259a2('bum): ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha'
259a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu yod dam/ 
259a4('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sprog rgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa de dang / myig gis log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/ sug
259a5('bum): las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba/ 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'a/ jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
259a6('bum): ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 
259a7('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun
259a8('bum): snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skyo ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye bar 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i
259b1('bum): ltar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
259b2('bum): mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang
259b3('bum): ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal do pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang sgoms pos kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la
259b4('bum): rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma
259b5('bum): mchis pa lags na/ lam gang skems pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba'i lam sgoms pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// / 
259b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhon pas sgyu ma sna tshogaso// glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ glang gi lus tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi
259b7('bum): tshogs sem/ zung myed kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul nas/ sgyu mdo las gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byil song gi skye gnas su 'gro bo la/ 
259b8('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ myir skyo ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'tshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrur
260a1('bum): dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa
260a2('bum): kud 'khor zhi lhang skye ba'om/ tshangs chen gi lhar skye ba 'am/ snod dri ltar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge
260a3('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myong dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tsho ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed
260a4('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba mam/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'amo/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye dab 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi lhar skye
