273a6('bum): dbur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu ste bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyind par bya/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
273a7('bum): brgyad pa rmi lam lta bur shes so// smre brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
273a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rmi lam lte bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / spyig rgya la bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
273b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams rmi lam b+ha lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
273b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
273b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yer lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de
273b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa na mas rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnon lta bu dang / myig lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur
273b5('bum): shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma/ mad kyis gnas pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmi lam lta bur shes// sgra banan lta bu dang / myig sor lci bu dang
273b6('bum): smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i ste stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
273b7('bum): rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes
273b8('bum): po rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge
274a1('bum): 'dzin rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
274a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / spel lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
274a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rmi lam lta bu shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig sor lta bu dang / smyug rgya la bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin/ 
274a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ myi 'jigs pa rnams rmi lam lta bur sa so// sgra brnyan lto bu dang / myig yar lta bu dang / smyig rgyu ste bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes
274a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang da/ reg par rig pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 
274a6('bum): sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pe la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 
274a7('bum): sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smrig
274a8('bum): rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / 
274b1('bum): smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu ra shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bur shes so// 
274b2('bum): myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so// 
274b3('bum): sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// sems can thams cad kyang rmi lam lta bu la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sgra brnyan la spyod do/ 
274b4('bum): zhes bya bar shes so// myig yor la spyod de zhes bya bar she/ ras so// smig rgyu la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sgyu ma la spyo da do zhes bya bar shes so// sprul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// 
274b5('bum): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i tshe/ sa rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de bzung zhing rnam pa thams
274b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
274b7('bum): thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig yor lta bu'i chos dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi/ 
274b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
275a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sprul pa/ 
275a2('bum): lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzin te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang bzung du med do// bsam gtan gi pho rol tu phyind pa
275a3('bum): yang bzung du myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// sbyin
275a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// nang stong pa nyi da kyang bzung du myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung
275a5('bum): du myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// don dam/ pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi/ nga bzung du myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed de/ 
275a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dor ba myed pa stong de nyid kyang bzung du myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// 
275a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// snang ba nyid kyang bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
275a8('bum): bzung du myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myod // dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyang bzung du myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
275b1('bum): nga myed/ rdzu gan gams rlung byed/ mas kyang zu byed/ du byed/ garnams yang du byed// rnams
275b2('bum): khyo pa nga sring byed// sags pa'i do pa smras kyang 'ang byud de/ srogata sa byung byed da do// byed pa rnams kyang zung byed do// gnas skye bar rnams pa
275b3('bum): drug pa mas kyang ba spyod // ma par bar rnams kyang ba'ang du rnying // mamadu kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyang nga da // rnam par ma mi du stod pa da du
275b4('bum): byu nga/ pa sbyis du / mas kyang lung myed do// dzin rnams kya myod// rnams byung du med de/ 
275b5('bum): nanama'i skyabs rnams kyang bzung du myed do// myi 'jig/ shes pa rnams kyang bzong du myed du// so so yang dag par rig po rnams kyang 'dred du myed do// sring rje rnon pa yang bzung du sted
275b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams stong bzung du med do// de bas na byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad bzung du skyed par byas song / blun myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
275b7('bum): rgyu nub tu na du gnyer // kyi phyir ni na/ 'di lta ces thams cad ni 'thung du myong cing dngos po myed pa ste/ rmyilam la bskrunanas du myig lor lnga b+h+yo/ sbyis rgyu // s+thAs swAT+Ta/ sprul pa lta ba n+tu/ 
275b8('bum): sems can de dag rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma gtogs par bzung du myed pa'i chos gang yang thob par myi nus pas// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen papo sems can thams cad
276a1('bum): kyi don du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gang ci gtong ba yang sems can thams cad kyi don du gtong ngo // 
276a2('bum): tshul khrims gang ci srung yang sems can thams cad kyi don du srung ngo // bzod pa gang ci sgom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom mo// brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang sems can thams cad kyi don du rtsom mo
276a3('bum): bsam gtan gang ci yang mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du mnyam par gzhog go// shes rab gang ci sgom pa yang sems can thams cad kyi don du sgom ste/ bdag gi don du ma yin no// 
276a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnamasarab kyi don du ma gtogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga du chub tu myi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
276a5('bum): sems can gang sems can myed pa la sems can gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas/ pa dang / srog myed pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba myed
276a6('bum): pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gse pa myed pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / skyes bu myed pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su ga nas pa dang / gang zag myed pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 
276a7('bum): shed can myed pa la shed can gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag myed pa la shed bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po myed pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po myed pa la byed du
276a8('bum): 'jug pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong ba po myed pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / slong du 'jug pa po myed pa la slong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po myed pa la tshor ba pa'i 'du shes su
276b1('bum): gnas pa dang / tshor du 'jug pa po myed pa la tshor du 'jug pa po myed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shes pa po myed pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po myed pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas
276b2('bum): pa de dag phyin ci log las rnam par 'grel te/ phyin ci log las rnam par grol zhing / 'chi ba myed pa'i dbyings su 'god do// de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su rgyu ste/ bdag gis 'du shes sam/ sems
276b3('bum): can gi 'du shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam/ 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sam/ skyes bu'i 'du shes sam/ gang zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gi 'du shes sam/ shed bdag gi 'du shes
276b4('bum): sam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes sam/ byed du 'jug pa po'i 'du she sa sam/ slong ba po'i 'du shes som/ slong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes
276b5('bum): sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sam/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su myi rgyu ste/ dri g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / 'dor/ ba dang / smras pa de dag btang nas spros pa myed pa'i sems kyis nye bar/ 
276b6('bum): sgrubs shing mang du spyod de/ rab 'byor nam grangs des byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa le spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid chos gang la yang mngon par zhen pa myed la/ 
276b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa myed pa la la rab tu 'god de de ni 'jig rten gi tha snyad gi don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs
276b8('bum): par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rten gi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
277a1('bum): chos 'dadi mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zhes bya bar ni 'jig rten gi tha skad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu/ 
277a2('bum): gang sang myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos 'dris tsas 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa zhes bya ba ni myi dmyigs pa ste/ de nyid kyis ni gang yang thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs
277a3('bum): par 'gyur ba byed do// gas yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis ni gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram
277a4('bum): chom ldan ngos kyis bka su lang pa gnyis kyis kyang zab pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba byed de/ gnyis su myed pas kyang thob pa dang / mngon par rnags par 'gyur ba snyed de/ gang la gnyis kya
277a5('bum): myed pa myi gnyis pa yang myed pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe no/ 'di ltar 'dzin thob par/ 'don mngon par rtogs par nas bya ba ni smras pa ste/ chos mnyam
277a6('bum): bo nyid mo smos pa myed de// smos pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do// gas ldad pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos dang dngos po ma mchis pa ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyis mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba yang ga/ 
277a7('bum): zhig mdzes// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa ma pa/ gang la dngos po myed pa dang / dngos pa myed pa yang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid myod pa dang / yongs su brjod pa myed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid de chos
277a8('bum): mnyam pa nyid pa de dag ni brjod du myed pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid martogs par yang dmyigs par 'gyur ba chos gang yang byed do// chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o// 
277b1('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa 'am/ 'phags pa 'am/ chos gang gis kyang shes par myi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul
277b2('bum): yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad ma yin te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi
277b3('bum): 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
277b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngas bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang
277b5('bum): gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/ ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin no ni/ de dra/ zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ 
277b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyu ra na/ rab 'byor de so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin/ 
277b7('bum): po dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
277b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang tshan pa den mnyam
278a1('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang myed do// de ltar so so'i skye ba rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams/ 
278a2('bum): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'dzin byis pa so so'i skye bo// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o/ 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra/ 
278a3('bum): bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba myed de/ rnam par
278a4('bum): rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs so// gsol dra pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni byis te bu so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig
278a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i/ 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems da pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
278a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag myi dmyigs na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhug sa pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
278a7('bum): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis
278a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig
278b1('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
278b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
278b3('bum): dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
278b4('bum): rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i sla da du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag dang 'jig
278b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog
278b6('bum): kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig lo chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa
278b7('bum): no/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la// chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ tsas dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gnanas/ 
278b8('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags/ chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags/ pa de nyid chos man/ 
279a1('bum): pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa
279a2('bum): ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra btso/ 
279a3('bum): pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par 'god par bgyi ba 'di ni bcom
279a4('bum): ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/ stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams rno bar dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
279a5('bum): yul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
279a6('bum): rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye nas yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/ myi
279a7('bum): yod par mngon nam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'tshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dga' ldan gi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'phrul
279a8('bum): dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam// tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam ga tshangs la nye phan gi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha yod pa
279b1('bum): mngon na/ tshangs chen gi lha yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 
279b2('bum): dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nas/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod
279b3('bum): par mngon nam/ tshad myed che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ myi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ myi rung ba'i lha yod par mngon
279b4('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom snang ba'ilha yod par mngon nam/ 'og myin gi lha yod par mngon nam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes
279b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ cung za da myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ 'du shes myed// 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sbyin pa'i
279b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon na
279b7('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyi nang stong pa
279b8('bum): nyid yod par mngon nam/ chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam
280a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mdo
280a2('bum): nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam
280a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod par mngon nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul gi
280a4('bum): rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ dbang po rnams yod par mdo nam/ stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yin lag brgya
280a5('bum): pa yod par mngon nam// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs myed pa'i/ 
280a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par thar
280a7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod par mngon nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par
280a8('bum): mngon nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ byams pa chen po yod par
280b1('bum): mngon nam/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu yod par/ 
280b2('bum): mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam// rang sangs rgyas
280b3('bum): kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyun du zhugs/ 
280b4('bum): pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon namaphyir myi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod par ma ra don nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam// byang chub ses
280b5('bum): dpa' yod par mngon nam// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni ma
280b6('bum): bar mngon par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de lta bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang myigs la chos rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
280b7('bum): mthu'o// / bam po/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba de bzhin
280b8('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rje su 'dra/ 
281a1('bum): dzarna mos kyang chos mnyam pa nyid myi g.yo lags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa yang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang ches ma
281a2('bum): pa nyid lngas myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir 'ong rnams kyang chos mnye pa nyid las/ 
281a3('bum): myi g.yo ba legs sam/ de bzhin du bgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi gsol ba lags su
281a4('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ches mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam+b+ha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor
281a5('bum): chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o// chos ma nyam pa nyid las myi 'anga'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ma
281a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa'i de bzhin dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyi
281a7('bum): sa dag pa'i mtha' gang med ba na so so'i skye ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang // mngon pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / grwananam yin pa'i de bzhin nyi dang / ches nyid dang / chos kyi stongs rnying
281a8('bum): pa da shes ma shi nga du 'tha rnams kyang nying pa ma pa'i de dang / gas sbyin pa'i
281b1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ma'o// de nyid ni chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ni
281b2('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin gi de bzhin nyid dang // chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid/ yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams
281b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag gi
281b4('bum): mtha'o// de nyid ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
281b5('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang // gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
281b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyi da dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan/ 
281b7('bum): ma yin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'// de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang // 
281b8('bum): nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin gi de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams
282a1('bum): bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / 
282a2('bum): dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang // chos nyid dang / chos kyi/ 
282a3('bum): dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni chos nyid dang / 
282a4('bum): rjes kyi dngos dang / chos kyi gnas nying dang / chos skyon myed panyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma no bu'i de bzhin dang / gzhanas yin pa de zhin nyid dpe / yang dag
282a5('bum): ni de bzhin nyid yin te/ de dag las chos mnyam ze nyid ces pa gzhan gang yang med nga/ rab 'byor gyis gsabacom ldan 'das ga te/ de ltar na so so'i skyen
282a6('bum): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid dad du'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid// de nyid chos kyi rje su 'brang ba rnaMs kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de nyid brgyad pa
282a7('bum): kyi chos mnyam pa nyid// de nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa nas kyi chos mnyam bzhed/ de nyid yon cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos mam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba nus kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ 
282a8('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
282b1('bum): gshegs g+sa mas pa mang ga par rdzogs pa sas rgyas rnams kyichis mnam pad lags na/ ldan 'das macan ny-i ste byad pa'i nas 'du/ ste/ gdun
282b2('bum): dang / 'dushes dang / 'byung dang / nam napa sa / / smras dang / na du m+WA 'i ngag su
283a1('bum): pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang // 
283a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
283a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dan ngan pa stong pa nyid
283a4('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa snang pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
283a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtsha// na nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos/ po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
283a6('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa chu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
283a7('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
283a8('bum): ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu rtsa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khas te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni kun
283b1('bum): kyang gcig dang gcig tu myi 'dra ba gcig las gcig 'das pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// 'du shes kyi chos/ 
283b2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/ myig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i chos nyid kyang
283b3('bum): gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg gi chos
283b4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan / chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshe/ sa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
283b5('bum): gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid rnam par she/ sa pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos
283b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'o 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
283b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te re
283b8('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
284a1('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
284a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi chos kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan mying
284a3('bum): dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i rang gzhin kyang gzhan/ len pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ srid
284a4('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi 'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan// 
284a5('bum): lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu na pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ches / 
284a6('bum): kyang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos glu zhin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
284a7('bum): kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ don dam
284a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi stong pa nyid chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan thog
284b1('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan rung
284b2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po
284b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
284b4('bum): gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyi da kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyi

284b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi chos bzhan/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar gi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
284b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ches nyid kyang gzhan
284b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / byams pa rjem po yi chos nyid kya
285a1('bum): gzhan/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dpe byad bzang po rnams
285a2('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid
285a3('bum): gcig par 'gyur lags/ ches rnams rnam par dgod pa ni ji ltar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la gdams shing chos/ 
285a4('bum): rnams tha dad du bgyi ba lags/ chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par myi nus na/ ji ltar na
285a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ sa nas sar 'phrar zhi nga skyon myed par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar skyon myed par zhugs
285a6('bum): nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa yong su rdzogs par bgyid lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas mngon par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin dang / 
285a7('bum): yong su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyid pa dang / bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzog par bgyid pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
285a8('bum): pa yong su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de dag la rnam par rtse bas/ 
285b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams snyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sos
285b2('bum): can rnams yongasu smin par bgyi ba lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu 'dzin pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du de ste chos thas cad kyi chos mnyam pa
285b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba'i rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyim pa nyid/ de rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams

286b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin na mo/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin

287a1('bum): nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi
287a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid
287a3('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid

287a6('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
287a7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
287a8('bum): kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ni
287b1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyi gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ngo bo cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pade nyid stong pa nyid mi yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyi gang yin
287b2('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam
287b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid snyom yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
287b4('bum): ma yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i
287b5('bum): bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid s+ho// nga pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid
287b6('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
287b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i
287b8('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 
288a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin
288a2('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
288a3('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ 
288a4('bum): nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyi da ma yin nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
288a5('bum): ma yin nam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni da stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs
288a6('bum): pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa
288a7('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ de bzhin
288a8('bum): gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 
288b1('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam// myig gi mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i mtshan nyid dam/ 
288b2('bum): lus kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/ dri'i mtshan nyid dam/ ro mtshan nyid dam/ reg gi mtshan nyid dam/ chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi rnam par
288b3('bum): shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi rnam par
288b4('bum): shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te re gu pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 
288b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma tshan nyid dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan/ 
288b6('bum): nyid dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cho/ 
288b7('bum): ba'i mtshan nyid dam// sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dma~M/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par
288b8('bum): shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mying dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i
289a1('bum): mdun dngam/ nga/ phred pa da/ srid po mnan da dang/ skye ba'imatshan da dam/ ni mnyan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha yang / 
289a2('bum): tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha lang tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam
289a3('bum): dani pa mang tu sbyin pa'i mchen nyid dam/ nas rab kyi pa mang du na pa'i mtshan nyid ngam/ deng stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ bya mang pa nyid kyimatshan nyid ma/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid #
289a4('bum): dang / chen po stong po nyid kyi mtshan nyid ngam/ don dab s+ho nga pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis da ngam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyidi ngas/ mthu la
289a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma skye/ da pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ chos
289a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dum/ rang gi mjam nyid stong po nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ nga bo nyid stong pa nyid
289a7('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngas pa skyed pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngas/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi
289a8('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam
289b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa rnams
289b2('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon par shes
289b3('bum): pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtsha stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi
289b4('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dum// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyi mtshan
289b5('bum): nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan ci ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang byang
289b6('bum): chub kyi mtshan nyid dam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i man
289b7('bum): nyid dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta
289b8('bum): bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord de lta bas na rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar rig
290a1('bum): par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang so so'i skye bo myed/ so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de myed/ de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang myed de/ dang bI/ 
290a2('bum): a rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de myed de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba myed/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de myed/ de la yang brgyad pa yang myed/ brgyad pa las gud na'ang de yang
290a3('bum): myed/ de la yang rgyun du zhugs pa myed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na'ang de myed de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na yang de myed la yang phyir myi 'ong ba myed phyin
290a4('bum): myi 'ong ba las gud na'ang de myed/ de la yang dgra bcom pa mye/ da/ dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de myed/ de la yang rang sang sa rgyas myed/ rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de myed/ de la
290a5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' myed/ byang chub sems dpa' las gud na 'ang de myed/ de la yang de bzhini gshegs pa myed/ de bzhi na gshegs pa las gud na yang de myed par rig par bya'o gsol
290a6('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das chos de nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin te 'dus
290a7('bum): byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas dmyigs su myed/ 'dus ma byas las gud na yang 'dus byas dmyigs su myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
290a8('bum): khas gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yong ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed
290b1('bum): pa'o// de yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi don dam par ma yin te/ don dam par ni lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid gi 'du byed myed de/ lus kyi 'du byed
290b2('bum): dang ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed las gud na yang don dam pa dmyigs su myed 'on kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste // 
290b3('bum): 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang mya g.yo la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa ya
290b4('bum): byed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dgis rtse/ 
290b5('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad des chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gis sto/ dang pa ste/ de'i slad du chos gang la yang gang yang chos ci yA
290b6('bum): bgyid pa ma mchis na/ de ltar chos thams cad ni ji yangabagyid pa ma mchis shing / ji yang ma lags pa la ji lta ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
290b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa las kyang myi g.yo' la/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don bgyi ba dang / don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa la
290b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la yang ji yang byed pa yang myed/ ji yang myi byed pa/ 
291a1('bum): yang myed de/ gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/ de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang myi g.yo la/ sems can rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing kyi bdag
291a2('bum): gi 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / sems can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
291a3('bum): pe dang / srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srog gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel da pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'gro ba'i
291a4('bum): 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'dre/ lad pa dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / bral bar byedacing / gso ba'i 'du shes dang / phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
291a5('bum): 'khor ba las 'geld pa dang / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skyes bu'i 'du shes dang / phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / gang zag gi 'du shes dang bral
291a6('bum): bar byed cing ni/ gang zag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / shed can gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis
291a7('bum): 'khor ba las 'gre lad pa dang / shed bdag gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shed bdag gi 'du shes dang / phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar
291a8('bum): byed cing / byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grelang pa dang / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'kho
291b1('bum): ba las 'grel pa dang / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / shes pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed
291b2('bum): cing / mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'geld pa dang / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
291b3('bum): ba las 'grel pra dang / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / 'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing 'du shes
291b4('bum): kyi 'du shes dang phrol nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gre lad pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang ldan par byed cing 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gre lad pa dang / rnam pa
291b5('bum): shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa / dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing myig

291b7('bum): bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 
291b8('bum): lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / yid kyi 'du she bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'du shes dang phral na stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grelang pa dang // zug kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / gzugs kyi 'du shwe dang bral na myom
292a1('bum): 'khor ba las 'gro lad pa dang / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sgra'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dri'i 'du
292a2('bum): shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / ro'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ro'i 'du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed

292a5('bum): shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'a grel pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed/ cing / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas
292a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor po las 'grel pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i rnam par zhes pa'i 'du shes rang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lus/ 
292a7('bum): rnam pam zhes pa'i 'du zhes dang bral bar byed cing / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong ba nyid kyis gakhor bsas 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rnam pa regs pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed
292a8('bum): ming kyirnam pa gas pa'i 'thun sa dadu thal nas/ blang ba nyid kyim par bas ma slab pa dang / phyag gi sum jog pa'i 'dugs dang bral bar byang song / rgyag gi lus log pa'i thugs dang blabanas/ 
292b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las dam masas kyi 'grel pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bram na ma stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang
292b2('bum): sna'i dus te reg pa 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i dus te reg pa'i/

292b4('bum): maud kyi dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i du shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las gas pa dang / myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis char ba'i du/

292b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / lce'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor/ 
292b8('bum): ba'i 'du shes dang / bral nas stong pa nyid kyi 'khor ba las/ 'grel pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing lus
293a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grelang pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / yid
293a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang // sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa
293a3('bum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gresad pa dang / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / me'i khams kyi 'du shes
293a4('bum): dang bral bar byed cig me'i khams kyi 'dugs dang bral du nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang / da kyi khrus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing rlung gyi khams kyi
293a5('bum): shes dang bral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las gre lang ba dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bram bar byed cingag/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral nas sno
293a6('bum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grelang pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gro
293a7('bum): pa dang // ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'greld pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing // 'du byed/ 
293a8('bum): kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba la
293b1('bum): 'grel pa dang / mying dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / mying dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang / 
293b2('bum): bral bar byed cing / skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral nas stong pa nyid
293b3('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rar+ya bA'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / sred pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ 
293b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / na pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / len pa'i 'du shes pa phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba mas 'grelang pa dang sring/ 
293b5('bum): ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa nga / skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / skye ba'i 'du shes dang / 
293b6('bum): bral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang / rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/ stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang // 'dus byas
293b7('bum): kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing / 'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa nyid yin yang / 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su dgod pa yang de bzhin
293b8('bum): gshegs pa'i khyu mchog go mgur myi 'gyur ro// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/ rab 'byor/ 
294a1('bum): la zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// sprul pa de gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de
294a2('bum): lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa che yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de gnyis ka yang / 
294a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ de ci'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do// 'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa mdzad do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang sprul da pa de gnyis ka yang stong
294a4('bum): pa nyid la dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sam/ tshor ba nam/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ 
294a5('bum): sprul ba de lto bu yod dam/ gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o// gsayo pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
294a6('bum): s+ho ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi deng / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
294a7('bum): pa dang // rnam par b.rang pa'i sgro gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par ba 'ad pa brgyad dang / mabar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge dzin/ 
294a8('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
294b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de dag gis 'brangs bu gang zagri ging zag rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag
294b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnams dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags saman/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang sprul pa ste/ 
294b3('bum): ma la ni nyan pos kyi sprum du pa'o// la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sprul de pa'o// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// la la nonyon mongs pa'i sprul rdo ba'o/ 
294b4('bum): swa hU~M sbrul dpa'o/ garab 'byor nam grangs des na chos thams cad kyi ga ni sprul pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyin pa da rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'dra ba'i 'bras
294b5('bum): bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am gzugs kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag
294b6('bum): sprus pa lags sas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i slol dang/ ra 'byord bskyed pa'as/ bkag pa'i chos gang dri yang rung ste/ dri sems cad ni sgyu ya pa'o// nas med pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang ma sbyi 'i
294b7('bum): chos de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ chos gang la skye ba yang myed/ 'gag pa yang myed pa/ de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
294b8('bum): mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chos de ni ma sprul pa'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang myi g.yol gnyis su yang myi dmyigs te/ chos gang yang stong pa nyid ma
295a1('bum): ga yin pa de lta bu myed do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das myi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab/ rab 'byor/ 
295a2('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
295a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i gang zag/ 
295a4('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal par bgyi na/ ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byord ji sngon dngos po yod/ 
295a5('bum): par 'gyur ba la/ phyis dngos po myed par 'gyur ba yod pa myed/ dngos po myeng pa yang myed/ ngo bo nyid kyang myed/ gzhan gyi du po yang myed na/ dri la gang yong su shes par bye ba'i ngo bo nyi
295a6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba sta ga la yod por 'gyur ra snyan// shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu byond pa stong phrag bamyob las/ chos nyid myi 'gyur bar bston pa'i le'u ste/ bdun nu ma gsum pa'o// 
295a7('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ che
295a8('bum): mtho bul dzin ces smras so// tsun cag ti kyi zung kyi du me pa ldan sa de bzhi ga shegs pa sa chis ska khyod/ de na kyis rnas pa
295b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa la 'dri skad ces smras so// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan 'apas ji nas cung zad kyang / 
295b2('bum): myi mthong ba myed pa dang / cung zad kyang nye bar myi 'dzin pa dang / cung zad kyang sgro btags pa myed pa dang / cung zad kyang mngon par slu ba myed pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

295b4('bum): pa mthong ba'o// chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/ chos thams cad mtshan nyi da myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs
295b5('bum): pa mthong ba'o// chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa mthong ba'o// 'gog pa mngon gsum du ma thong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum
295b6('bum): gyi ngo bo nyid mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// khams gsum pa rab tu zhi bar nye bar gnas pa/ 
295b7('bum): mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// zhi ba mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gnyis su myed pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// sna tshogs pa ma yin pa dang ba dad pa ma chi
295b8('bum): pa mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gnas myed par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gzhi myed par mthong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mithong ba'o// kun gzhi ma skyes par ma tho
296a1('bum): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nga / zug lams par mthong ni de bzhin gshegs pa thong 'o// spros pa skyed du'i'i skyes ma gsus rgyu rgya 'ong ni dri bzhinan
296a2('bum): pa mthong ba'o// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs po mthong ba'o// myi mnyam pa myed
296a3('bum): pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs po mthong ba'o// mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mthong ba dang / len pa myed par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// mchog dang rab mchog dngo// 
296a4('bum): dri ma myong ba dang / dri ma dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / darnyog pa myed pa dang / shinang du dad pa'i dbyings mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// srid par 'byung ba'i 'gro ba yongs
296a5('bum): su chad par gyu rad par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong po'o// 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi'o// po las rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de'o// nam mkha'i
296a6('bum): ngos ltar dri ma myed pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// ma 'dres pa'i dbyings mthong po ni de bzhin gshe gas pa mthong ba'o// byams pa kun tu g.yo ba thams cad dang bral

296a8('bum): long gyi dkyil 'khor la/ skyes bu'i myig gi dbang po skyon myed par gyur pa la la zhig gas/ rang gyi bzhin ras gyi rnam par gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang
296b1('bum): chub sems dpa' log par g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa galate/

296b8('bum): med pa byed pa'i mi ge de nyid kyang yi gi dzin nyid gyis spong pa sa yin no// byams pa de bzhin du/ tsho ba dang/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa shes pa'i tshe na kyis
298a1('bum): stong ba ste/ yi ge gang gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes brjod par byed pa'i yi ge de nyid kyang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin no// byams pa stong bzhid ces rgya ba 'di ni sgo brtags pa'i ma/ 
298a2('bum): nyid de bzhin du stong ba nyid ni ma smin no// 'di ni smra ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin du sgo btags pa myed cing sru ba skyed pa yin no// byams pa pon nyid thams cad bral pa 'don rdzong ces kyi// mnan
298a3('bum): ma thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad dang bral po ni stong pa nyid do// brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig gi lam thams cad las 'das pa/ yi ge myed pa btags/ 
298a4('bum): pa myed pa/ btags par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba/ myig gis mthong ba myed pa/ rna bas thos pa myed pa/ sna'i sa bsnam du myed pa/ lce yis myang du myed pa/ lus kyis reg tu mye

298a6('bum): yi ge myed pa/ 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul tu gyur dpa/ 'gro ba dam pa yang dag par stond pa/ lta bar rtogs pa/ thams cad rtsa nas 'byind pa/ 'dzind pa thams cad nges par 'joms par/ 
298a7('bum): par byed pa/ nyes pa thams cad sel bar byed pa/ snang bar byed pa/ gsal bar byed pa/ kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa/ skye bo mkhas pa ma yin
298a8('bum): yang dag par sad par byed pa/ mthong ba ni stong pa nyid mthong ngo ste/ byams pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang yin pa
298b1('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// byams pa gang gis stong pa nyid yang dag par mthong ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa mthong
298b2('bum): ba des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang ji nas kyang sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa dang / gso ba myed pa dang / skyes bu myed pa dang / shid can
298b3('bum): myed pa dang / shed bdag myed pa dang / rtag pa myed pa dang / chad pa myed pa dang / nga'i ba myed pa dang / nga'i ba myed par ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ gang de ltar mthong po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
298b4('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ri lod tu phyind pa/ la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes
298b5('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ sa rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal/ si'i khams spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la stsa
298b6('bum): pa ma yin no// gal te chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ 
298b7('bum): ma yin no// galpa tra myig gi rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
298b8('bum): shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te gzugs ni bdag go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
299a1('bum): yod du na pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du ga tshe ba dang / shes dung 'du byed dang / rnas pa shes pa ni dag go zhes spyod na/ shes kyis 'ong du phyin pa smra spyod ba yin na/ 
299a2('bum): ma'i bamam son padag gi nas spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ de bzhon dugal te mu'i khams dang / mo'i basmos dang / rlung gyi khams dang / nam mtha'o khom spa sa
299a3('bum): shes pa'i khams ni bdag go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te pidag ni go zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te na
299a4('bum): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag go zhes spyod nashes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te bdag na sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o zhes
299a5('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin/ de bzhin du gal te bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi
299a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gald te shes rab
299a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// byams pa stong pa nyid kyi rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa na chos
299a8('bum): gnyis po stong po nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa la kun tu bsten par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin/ 
299b1('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid do// byams pa gang la mtshan ma myed pa de ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// byams pa de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu// 
299b2('bum): mo dad pa dang ldan pas chos 'di la bstend par bya ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pas na rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
299b3('bum): po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par rtog pa rnams gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa rnam par rtog pa rnams ni yid
299b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa las byung // byams pas sul pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / sha ra dwa tri'i bus smras pa/ byams pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gyi/ 
299b5('bum): rnam par shes pa las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / bya// mas pa myig gyi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs las byung ngo // byas
299b6('bum): pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs lngas byung / byams pa gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gzugs ni don dam par ngo bo nyid
299b7('bum): kyis stong pa ste/ gang don dam pa'i gzugs de ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa skye bo rnams la 'drid par byed pa yin na/ de la so so'i skye bo thos pa dang myi ldan pa rnams gzugs kyi 'du shes nges par skye ba
299b8('bum): 'gyur ro// des de ltar gzugs su mngon par brtags nas gzugs la brtend te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rkyen du 'gyur to// de
300a1('bum): ni yang dag pa ma yin pas nye bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang myi ldan pa rnams yid kyi rnam pa 'di ltar bzang ba nyid dang / gzugs nyid dang / kha dog nyid dang / 
300a2('bum): ma/ rgyas pa nyid du nye bar ba su rtog par byed do// de de ltar rnam par rtog pas rgyun de myi 'chad par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir dang / 
300a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba yang dag par myi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa rnams ni gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de nyid thams cad du stong pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba
300a4('bum): dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / snying po myed pa nyid du/ yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byams pa de yang dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu mkhas pa 'am/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas
300a5('bum): pas sgyu ma'i las gyis grwa nga po che'i tshogs dang / gsu dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / phung bu chung gyi tshogs na pa bzhi po nye bar bstan par gyur la/ de la skyes bu mkhas pa la/ 
300a6('bum): la zhig gyis bltas pa dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags par gyur cing des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin nye bar dmyigs pa ni stong pa nyid yin pa/ 
300a7('bum): ston par byed cing / gsog nyid du bstand pa dang / gsob nyid du bstan pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu mor byas pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de bzhin
300a8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' la gagazugs gang dang gang nye bar gyur pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ngo / gsog nyid du mthong ngo / gsob nyid du mthong ngo // snying po myed pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na
300b1('bum): gzugs de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzha' tshon nam/ dri za'i grong khyer blta na sdug par nye bar 'phags par snang bar gyur pa dag la skyes bu la la zhig gis mtho
300b2('bum): ba dang / nyes par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur la/ des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par nye bor brtags par gyur pa na/
