300b3('bum): stong pa nyid du stond par byed pa dang / gsog nyid du ston par byed pa dang / gsobo nyid du stonod par byed pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar na gzugs de yongs su ma shes
300b4('bum): pa'i phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'byung ba'i 'du shes yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir ro/ de de ltar gzugs la mkhas pa dang / 'du shes la mkhas pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byung ba'i tshul
300b5('bum): khrims kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / nag nog myed pa dang / nges par 'byung ba can// dang / byis pa rnams kyi sdom pa la yang dag par 'das pa/ 'phags
300b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug yang drag por 'jug pa dang zag pa myed pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba dang / gnas myed par gyur pa yin no// de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de/ 
300b7('bum): sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i yid la byed pa thas cad nas thams cad du 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing / nub pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su bcugs pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de'i
300b8('bum): sems rang nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur gyi sems kyi dbang tu myi 'gyur ro// de ltar sems la dbang thob nas de'i sems gang dang gang skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad kyang byang chub la gzhol ba dang / byang chub la 'bab pa dang / 
301a1('bum): byang chub la 'bab par gyur pa dang / mchog dang / khyad par tu 'phags pa dang / rgya che ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 
301a2('bum): rgyud gcig tu 'jug pa dang / yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa yin zhing de 'dug pa 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'chag pa 'am/ nyal bar gyur pa na yin
301a3('bum): la byed pa gzhan myed par de'i sems 'bad pa myed par don gyi bya ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba'i dus la bab par gyur cing / dus
301a4('bum): de dang nye bar gnas par gyur pa na/ 'bad pa myed par mngal gyi sgor nye bar phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mngal gyi sgo nas nges pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji nas kyang / 
301a5('bum): chos nyid de la so sor dmyigs pa nyid na/ byang chub sems// dpa'i sems 'bad pa myed par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la
301a6('bum): sa la gyu / sa dge pa gnas por gyur pa na/ 'dub rtsod pa shing ces srog pa ga pa ma nas gyur da/ dgag pa rgyu nga / 
301a7('bum): gas rgyun ma cu gnos pa dang / 'gas pa'i rgyun 'i pa par gyur / rnams padu zhin du byang chu mas sa 'a sems yang ba skyed na gyi gyi masas kyi
301a8('bum): da ma byed pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyura'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ sna'i 'jog nad du skye bar 'gyur ba'ims can rnams ni/ thazad pa myed por lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur rgya/ 
301b1('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bad pa myed par don gyi bya ba thams cad kyis/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar sems bskyed kyang mngon par shes par/ 
301b2('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag pa de la byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad pa gyis byed de/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni byang chub seMs
301b3('bum): ngo ba'i shes rab kyi stobs yin no// gang sems can yang nye bar myi dmyigs la/ 'khor ba'i nges pas kyang gos par myi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par yin no// 
301b4('bum): gzhan yang bya nga chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs dang shes rab kyi khyad par ni kun du spyod pa gnyis mthong ba ni bya chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// kun du spyod pa ga
301b5('bum): mthong bas ma gos pa ni shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyan thos kyi nges pa las 'das pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes ba kyi stobs so// de la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i
301b6('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// phyi dang nang gyi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yongs su spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rnam par smin pa la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
301b7('bum): kyi khyad par ro// tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de dpa' myi dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// khro ba myed pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa
301b8('bum): shes rab kyi stobs so// byams pa'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// brtson 'grus 'bar ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yid yong su
302a1('bum): skyo ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de la/ 
302a2('bum): mngon par zhend pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// shes rab bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can dang srog nye bar myi dmyigs pa ni byang chub
302a3('bum): sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can la ltos pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de bzhin gshe
302a4('bum): pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas cig nyid du ston pa ni/ chos kyi sku yang dag par sten dpa
302a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sang // sa rgyas sna tshogs pa nyid du yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub/ sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas thams cad
302a6('bum): sangs rgyas nyid du stond pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthu sna tshogs pa nyid du stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu ci// 
302a7('bum): pa nyid du stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs
302a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzind pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stob so// 
302b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su smon pI ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che ba yang dag par len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// zab mo/ 
302b2('bum): spyod pa ni sla drug par stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu nges par 'byung ba la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs so// srid pa tha ma pa'i nges par/ 
302b3('bum): 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dbang phyug che ba'i lha'i 'jig rten tu skyes shing gnas te/ mngon par byang chub pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// 
302b4('bum): byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang dag par stond pa nibyang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bdud kyi las yongs su shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ 
302b5('bum): bdud thams cad tshar gcan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo legs par/ skor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi
302b6('bum): 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mya ngan lnga
302b7('bum): 'das pa yang dag par stond pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la so sor rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de rnams yang dag par ston pa
302b8('bum): nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba'i tshul mngon gsum tu byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// myi zad pa'i tshul yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub sems
303a1('bum): cag dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos mngon gsum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stongs so// lam derab tu shes par byed pa ni byang chub sems pani
303a2('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul gcig mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stongs so// sna tshogs pa'i tshul stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i gas rab kyi khyad par gi nyon mongs pa ni
303a3('bum): bar myi dmyigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po rab tu shes pa ni byeng chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don dam pa mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub
303a4('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs 'dri ba gsald par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khya drang bar ro// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas tshul gcig tu yang dag
303a5('bum): par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa nyid du stond pa ni byang chub semasadapa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa chen po la 'jug pa
303a6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snying rje chen po la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
303a7('bum): rab kyi stobs so// sems can rnams la bde bar 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par bya'o// dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rtag tu zhi ba rnam par 'al
303a8('bum): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro/ btang snyoms chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can gyi bya ba la skyo ba myed pa ni byang chub sems da pa'i shes
303b1('bum): rab kyi khyang par ro// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni byang chub sems drapa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// gdul bya bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khya
303b2('bum): par ro// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mos pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bar bya ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni/ byang chub
303b3('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yi ge bsam gyis myi khyab pa stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba sna tshogs pa stond par byed pa ni byang chub
303b4('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgra dang byangs sna tshog nas su mngon par bstond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes darab kyi stobs so// sgra skad sna tshogs mngon par mos pa'i
303b5('bum): gdul bya rnams gdul bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// spobs pa sna tshogs pa nyid na/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ phyir rgol
303b6('bum): thams cad tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dus su smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// don yod pa'i chos ston par byed pa ni byang chub ses
303b7('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yang dag par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du smra ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de nas
303b8('bum): lha'i bu la la zhig 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du 'dus par gyur pa de yang dag pa ma yin par smra ba nyid sgrar smra ba nyid la rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal
304a1('bum): pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rgyur gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chald pa'i rkyend du gyu ra pa dang / tshul khrims 'chalang pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa
304a2('bum): de nyid btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi btams pa 'di ji zhig yin snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus yun ring por lon pa zhig na/ sangs
304a3('bum): rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// lnga'i bu dag khyed rnams kyis ji ltar rjes su bsams pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
304a4('bum): byed pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu 'ond kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos gang yang dag yin/ rnga ba de brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'di
304a5('bum): par byed pa/ myi rtag pa mya brtan pa ther zug pa ma yin pa yod/ sa su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas na/ de'i phyir yang dag/ pa ma yin pa zhes bshad do// de yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes
304a6('bum): rab kyi khyad par gyis sred pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la nye bar stond pa byed cing / sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i chu bo ra nub pa/ 'khor ba'i btson ral mngon par dga' ba/ phyi nang ci
304a7('bum): log pa zhes phyind ci log du gyurod pa/ bdag tu 'dzind pa dang mngon par ldan pa/ 'jig tshogs su lta ba rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs pa/ zlo ba dad par gyur pa/ sdig pa lngas snyigs par gyur da
304a8('bum): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa/ sems rnam par myos pa/ sems rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la bde ba myed pa/ sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ 'dus byas
304b1('bum): kyibyed pa nams thos nas dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol bar rargyu pa yin la/ dge ba'i chos mngon par gzhol ba de rnams sdom pa rnam par dag par gyur cing sems kyi ngo bo nyid po ba nas de'i 'ogan
304b2('bum): 'dus byas kyi bde bu las bsla ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba la 'jog par byed do// yA'i du rgyu dri rkyen 'dis ni sang dag pa me yin te/ sgrub 'dod byang chu sems dpa shes sa kyi khyang ba na
304b3('bum): spras pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang tshe dang ldan po sha rarA dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes/ 
304b4('bum): rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par la yang khyed spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
304b5('bum): 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la re ba me/ da pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snyan pa
304b6('bum): smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ngag gyi sdom pa sbyin pa dang bcang ba nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyi dpar ro// don spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs
304b7('bum): byang chub kyi sems 'drid pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa shes rang gyi khyad byung ngo // don mthun padzin/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad pa mi sgribs ste/ rjes mthun pa'i gdul bya ba rnams
304b8('bum): mo'i bang son byang chub sems tshogasoras kyi bya / bya du kyi phyonas kyi ches rnams sos du rdzogs pa byed pa ni/ byang chu sems ci'i gis bgyi nas so/ phran myed pa langangs
304'a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa de ltar bslab pa kun tu spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
304'a2('bum): gang yi rtsa na pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas zil gyis gnon pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa
304'a3('bum): mthong bar gyur pa yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyid ni chos thams cad yongs su bsdu ba shes pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bstan pa na lha'i bu lnga stong gyis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa/ 
304'a4('bum): thob par gyur to// srog chags brgya sto/ nga phrag mang po ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / de mi dang bral ba rnam par dgapar gyur to// lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu myed pa ni bla na mya
304'a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes so// lha'i bu bye ba dpag tu med pas lha'i me tog ma d+ha ra dang / ma d+ha nyar ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti/ 
304'a6('bum): bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la byams pa la gtor mngon par gtor bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skra gser gyi mdog can lba na bza' ba shus te/ tshe dang ldan
304'a7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la chos kyi dga' bar stsal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyor ba btung
304'a8('bum): nas/ na bza' de yang dag par mnos te/ blangs nas spyi bor gzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di na ched du brjod do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lho dang bcas
304'b1('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ston du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi mdog can las na bza' ba shus te/ chos kyi mchog pa
304'b2('bum): rjes su mthun par stsal pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bos par gyur pa de rnams ni lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa yin/ par shes par bya/ 
304'b3('bum): yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / theg pa chen po la nges par zhugs shing tshogs yang dag par stsogs par gyur pa dang / skye
304'b4('bum): ba de dang de yongs su rjes pa na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba la legs par 'basnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyun la nges par 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang 'dzin / 
304'b5('bum): par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang nga / rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / lung nod par byed pa dang / s+ho/ nad par byed pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / yi ger 'di ba dang
304'b6('bum): yi gor 'dir 'jug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshon dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed pa dang / 
304'b7('bum): bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / brjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa'i sems can rnams ltasmos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ sha ra/ 
304'b8('bum): dA ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog gsum po ni 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs gi bu mo gang la la shes rab
305a1('bum): kyi pha rolang du phyin pa 'di'i'adzinang pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa da/ 
305a2('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed pa de ni dbang po ma tshang bar myi 'gyur/ myi khom pa rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang bral bar myi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams pa
305a3('bum): myi 'gyur te/ gzhan du de 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing / der skyes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha rnams su 'gyur zhing / chos kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga'i/ 
305a4('bum): lus kyi dga' ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// de de nas shi 'phos nas myi'i nang du dad pa dang ldan zhing yang dag par 'byo rad pa dang ldan pa'i myi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas
305a5('bum): de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byams po las chos bstan da pa thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba tu nges par gyur to// 'di yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
305a6('bum): de'i phan yin par shes par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu dri ma med par bkod pa zhes bya bar 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur nas/ 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
305a7('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bkuri stir bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / rjed par bgyid pa
305a8('bum): dang / gsol par bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa'i
305b1('bum): sa kyi su ma rigs dribu mo de dag ni dug gis 'dzin rjes bgyid par kyi 'gyur/ skyes 'di ba'i dus bgyid par kyi 'byug cus ma pa'i rdus bgyid pa myi 'gyu/ mngon zhes kyi
305b2('bum): myi 'gyur/ rjed byed dang / smyo byed dag/ gzho nu'i gdon gyis bzung ste/ 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang dbang po bde bar gnas pa dang / tshig 'khrul pa skyed pa dang / yongs su na/ 
305b3('bum): pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag
305b4('bum): de de bzhin te/ dri de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa/ sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di ska da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
305b5('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'od 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / chu mi bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag
305b6('bum): stonang par byed pa de la bdag gis stobs dang / mthu dang / rnyed por bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / yang dag par sba bar bgyi'o// myi ma yin pa rnams kyang de la srung ba byed pa nyid
305b7('bum): du bgyi bar 'tshal pa dang / de la myi ma yin pa rnams bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bdud gyi las yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyang de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ba dang / de la gcan
305b8('bum): gzan gdug pa rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / de'i 'thab pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rtsod par smra ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnyid log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ba dang / 
306a1('bum): skrag cing 'jigs pa myed pa'i rmi lam mthong ba dang / de'i nyin mo dang / mtshan mo bde bas 'da' bar byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa gang dag yod pa de thams cad mthong ba'i chos la yongs su zad par/ 
306a2('bum): 'gyur ba dang / de la 'gro'i nad dam/ myig gi nad dam/ rtsib logs kyi nad dam/ lto ba'i nad dam/ rlung gi nad dam/ mkhris pa'i nad dam/ bad kan gyi nad dag 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi ram/ 
306a3('bum): tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ yul gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ mchi ma 'dzag pa 'am/ yid du mya 'ong ba thos pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i nges pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'byung bar myi 'gyur bar bgyi'o// 
306a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos smra ba gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phand pa 'di thos pa dang / yang dag par gzung ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas
306a5('bum): pa'i chos smra ba de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// sbyin pa'i// gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i chos bshes gnyen gyi 'a du shes dang / stond pa'i 'du shes dang / nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes
306a6('bum): skyed par bya'o// des chos smra ba de'i yon tan rjes su bsgrag par bya ba dang / bstod pa'i tshig skrag par bya ba dang / blta bar 'dod dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
306a7('bum): smra ba ni 'jig rten long ba rnams la mig ste bar byed pa yin no// chos smra ba mchod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang po/ byams pa li gso legs
306a8('bum): sa// tshig 'di legs par smras so// de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus kyang bshad pa legs legaso// stong phrag brgya ba las/ byams pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
306b1('bum): bam po// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal da pa// rab 'byor gzhan
306b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol bar 'dod pas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
306b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs myi zad pa sgrogs pa'i drung no// tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'
306b4('bum): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub so/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306b5('bum): phyi nid pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ ci ltar btsal ba lags de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ra ba 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// rab 'byor byang chub
306b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshol ba na/ lus don tu mi gnyer ba dang / srog la ltos pa myed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bku ri sta dag la myi gnas pa de ltar
306b7('bum): yongs su btsalang to// de shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa yongs su tshol cing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyinang po na/ bar snang nas sgra 'di lta bu thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / 
306b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur gis/ ji nas kyang lus ngal ba yid la byed pa myi snyed pa dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa yad la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung
307a1('bum): ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed la myi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / chab yid la byed pa myi skyed pa de skar song shig/ 
307a2('bum): rigs kyi bu nang dum phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon du ma lto bor song shig/ lce phyogs su ma yin/ nub phyogs su ma yin/ khyod phyogs su ma yin/ 
307a3('bum): steng du ma yin/ 'og tu ma yin/ phyogs mtshams su ma lta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jig tshogs las ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas kyang gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / tshor ba las
307a4('bum): ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar so pa ni skrag/ gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyamangs par 'gyur ro// 
307a5('bum): ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur// gang sangs rgyas kyi cho sa rma mas las nyams par gyur da pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor
307a6('bum): ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod cing rjes su 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di snod ces smras so// 
307a7('bum): de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bsdu zhing bsgrub par
307a8('bum): 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so ki rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
307b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du le sgras bos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshon ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i chos dag la mos bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su brtsam
307b2('bum): bar bya'o// khyed kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya'o// dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes
307b3('bum): gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams stond par byed pa dag la bsnyend par bya/ bsnyen
307b4('bum): bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring po myi tho rdzogs par shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyind pa glegs bam tu chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi/ 
307b5('bum): bu gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di thos pa de la// khyod kyis stond par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod kyis byas// pa bzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol
307b6('bum): tu phyind pa thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge bo'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bdag gis thos pas myur tu zla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur
307b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / nye bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ myi khom pa rnams yongasu
307b8('bum): spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar phan yon 'di rnams kyis yongs su brtags la/ dge slong chos smra ba la stond pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyeng
308a1('bum): kyis 'jig rten gyi lang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'drang bar myi bya/ khyod kyis chos sgru ba la don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin lda
308a2('bum): bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ bdud sdig brnyan ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg byadag bste
308a3('bum): par bya/ bstend par bya/ spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar stond par byed pa de dag khye du zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su 'grogs pa dang / bstend pa dang / bsnyend par gyis
308a4('bum): shig ces zer ba yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra / da ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par myi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di lta der bskyed par myi bya ste/ bdag gis ni thabs la mkhas pa
308a5('bum): de myi shes so// 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bsten par 'grogs te bsnyend par bya'o// de nas byang chub
308a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa myed kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi dbu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos
308a7('bum): rnams kyi tshul yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
308a8('bum): te/ chos thams cad ni sems can myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gang zag myed pa/ dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmyi lam lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu yin no// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yong
308b1('bum): dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang na/ ring po myi bogs par shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyims la so/ 
308b2('bum): shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing myi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir 'gyed par myi bya ste/ gzhan du
308b3('bum): na chos dond du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid yongs su mi skyo bas/ dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems pa/ 
308b4('bum): chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstand pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyi nad par de 'di N+Da snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid du 'gro ba/ 
308b5('bum): bya ba dang / su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par/ 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam nas/ des phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing ma// ngan byed pa dang / smre sngags 'odo nad pa bzhin du 'dug go// 
308b6('bum): de sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar byed do// de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun gyi bar gyi nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo 'da' bar bya
308b7('bum): ba de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du ngal ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid yid la byed pa myi skyed/ bza' yid la byed pa myi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed
308b8('bum): pa myi bskyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa myi skyod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu cig/ 
309a1('bum): ga ka 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur / de bu'i mya ngan gis bu gcig pu mid la byed pa ma gtogs par 'ad la byed pa sa gtogs par yid sa byed/ 
309a2('bum): gzhan gang yang myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / shar phyog/ 
309a3('bum): su 'gro ba 'di nye ring ni ci tsam su las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan yang myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byord de nas byang chub sems dpal
309a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i/ mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig bzhugs na/ sa legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de
309a5('bum): skad smra ba ni legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
309a6('bum): kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su btsa lad to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don tu gnyer ba 'di dang / 
309a7('bum): 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'bra'i zhing shar phyogs de nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/ spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim pa bdun
309a8('bum): gis yongs su bskor pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa / 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba la
309b1('bum): skye ma mcho sa skye / grong pa / ngas sa sa margyas bsdu rgyangag gis mi ban du ga mas / / zhes pa skye
309b2('bum): ngag tu 'am pa brtags pa/ grong khyed kyi khor yug tu nas gyi phyi rin po masna na lasu legs par byas shing / ba sa 'i rje bdun gyi ba dre dag gi mnganas pa rnams ni 'jam dun
309b3('bum): chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtsho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin pa rje sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mang/ 
309b4('bum): yab las shing skyes pa/ thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i ra thA gu byung bas/ mda' yab gcig gicig shos gzhon dang 'brel dang/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril du
309b5('bum): g.yer ka'i dra bas khyebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer/ ka de dag la rlung gyis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du/ 'ong ba dag 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste dper na/ yan leg lnga/ 
309b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid khu 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ 
309b7('bum): sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse zhing dag/ 'a la dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de'i 'khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / legs par 'bab pa/ rmuH
309b8('bum): cang yang myi grang ha cang yang myi dro bas gang dag yod do// chu de la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smind pas grub bos/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga'/ 
310a1('bum): mgur yongs su spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang mye tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po dag gis khyebs pa/ mye tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim po dad ldang ba gzhan
310a2('bum): ngag gis kyang khyebs te/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na myed pa gang yang myed do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga
310a3('bum): brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing lta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed mos tshal de dag re re nas yang rdzing bu kho ra yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga
310a4('bum): brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas/ ri dan po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pa dad mo dang / pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta
310a5('bum): na sdug pa dag bskyes te/ de dag gis chu de khyebs shing / me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pad ma ka/ po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
310a6('bum): ste/ sngon po/ kho dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston dpa/ 'od sngon por 'byung ba/ ser po/ khwa dog ser po/ ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po dmar po
310a7('bum): thung sa/ pa po// kha dag ga yo// dgar baM lta bur ston pa/ 'ad dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad la nga ba dang / drung ba dang // khrung khrung dang / byA kA ran da kA dang / gzha dag
310a8('bum): ga de'u sa 'byid pa dag song ngo do// skyed mas tsham de dag thams cad kyang ngamir bya ba skyed pa ris su gcad pa myed de/ 'di ltar sems can dag sun ring po zhis rab kyi po rol tu phyind pa la spyod ci / 
310b1('bum): mun ri bor chos phub mo la lhag par mos pa'i sems can dag ni sngon gyi rnam par sbyin pa las grub pa yin no// rigs kyi du grong khyer de dag gi dngas kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems da/ 
310b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor srog tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par bkra zhing ltan sdug pa/ rab rim bdun dang/ ta ma'i
310b3('bum): ba bdun gis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na/ khang pa'i long spyod du rtag tu rab tu dga' zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan myed ces bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya
310b4('bum): ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal zhe/ bzhi yod de/ bskyed mos tshal re re na yang rdzing bu zhes bya ba dang / bzang po'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' bo zhes
310b5('bum): bya ba dang / dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / bde baHzhes bya ba dang / bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / myi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de rnas
310b6('bum): kyai ngos cig pa gser las byas pa'o// ngos gnyis pA lus byas pa'o// ngos gsum pa ni bye dur+ya las byas pa'o// ngos bzhi pa ni shol las byas pa'o// nang gyi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las byas
310b7('bum): la/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re ren yang them sras rin po che sna bdun tshogs pa/ rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa/ sgras kyi rim bus mdzes par byas pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ 
310b8('bum): sgras de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi bem sras de dag thams cad las kyang 'jam bu'i chu bo gsor gyi shing ldan pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi mun mato/ 
311a1('bum): ku mu dadang / ud pal dang / padad+ma ma dkar po snga tshogs kyis khebs te/ ngang ma dang / dUr pa dang / khrung khrung dang bya ka ran da dang / gzhad rnams skad 'byin to// rdzi bu de dag gi 'khor sug kun nas/ 
311a2('bum): me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu yang can dan ga dir phyogs shing // kha dog dang
311a3('bum): ldan/ dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa/ bud myed drug khri brgyad stong dang / lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te rtse dga' zhing dag/ 
311a4('bum): mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud myed gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lamad rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor
311a5('bum): te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur yongs su spyod do// yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/ dgal mgur spyod cing de na dus gsum
311a6('bum): tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus gi bzhi mdor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang
311a7('bum): pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bye du r+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ snying po can tu byas pa/ ka shi pa'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa kha shes
311a8('bum): steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgya nad pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu me tog sna lnga dag la mngon par gtor cing / sa phyo gas de yang spos sna tshogs dang / gdug pa
311b1('bum): sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstond to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus pa / 
311b2('bum): byed cingapa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyand to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang myi srogs brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang ba srog
311b3('bum): chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'di/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ rgyu de dang rkyend des sems can de dag thams cad kya
311b4('bum): log par myi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs rang pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu bya/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du so
311b5('bum): shig/ de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yu ni ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yang dag/ 
311b6('bum): par stond pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ pa/ yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ci ltar tshol ba bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
311b7('bum): pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin dang mtshan tu yid la byed pa rgyun ma gcod par song shig dang / ring po myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
311b8('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshig de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis zug rngus phog/ 
312a1('bum): na yid la byed pa gzhan myi skyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las tha rad par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin dad pa'i smand pa bdag gis nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems par gyuror to// de bzhin du bya
312a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de thos par byed cing / gang chos thos nas bdag gi dmyigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs
312a3('bum): kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la myi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thos
312a4('bum): cad la myi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ ting nge 'dzin gi sgo du ma mngon du gyu rid pa nyams su myong ba ni 'di lta ste/ chosanyasems cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
312a5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa thams cad myi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nga nga/ chos thams cad rnam pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
312a6('bum): chos thams cad 'gyur ba myed pa ro mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad sa myi shes pa se pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
312a7('bum): chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i dring nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po myi 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par sma
312a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / me long gyi dkyil 'khor zhe snang ba zhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad mngon/ 
312b1('bum): bar dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgyu ma la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang/ tshig dang / yi ge 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes/ 
312b2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rang bzhin rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thar pa po zab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / rdu
312b3('bum): dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying dang nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshig dang yi ge 'bru la mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
312b4('bum): cad bsgrib pa myed pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu/ da zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi rdul dang sel du ba
312b5('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyal ba thob po zhes bya ba'i ngange 'dzind dang / myi ldog pa'i myig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin / dang / chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
312b6('bum): dag dbugs 'byind pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / si ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul
312b7('bum): myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge'idzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
312b8('bum): dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos pa thams cad la mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang myi 'jigs pa thob pa
313a1('bum): 'bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi dag chos thams cad la mngon par phyid pa zhes bya ba'i ting bye 'in dang / rjes thams cad kyi 'khyod pargyam po zhes bya ba'i ting de 'idzini dang / chos thams cad kyi bye dran
313a2('bum): myed par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs pa thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mtshan
313a3('bum): ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos zab mo'i'o// 
313a4('bum): 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi/ nad dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes
313a5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nid dang / 'jig rten gsum las mngon parazhend pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhe sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i
313a6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams mngon tu gyu rad te/ de ting nge 'dzind de dag la gnas te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rna gi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ byang chu
313a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rab tu stond pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad/ 
313a8('bum): tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa 'di bzhin btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzind 'di dag
313b1('bum): byang bya ba sa ga dag pa byes sum ma / sa kyi byed di gas kyi du mi gong gas kya sa semasas
313b2('bum): nasonas/ de kyi 'di ba'i sus kyi steng gi kha dog sa ste/ skyes btsun gro'i can ma bcus gnyis dang / dang byang bang rgyad srung dang / 'od dos ga du ba kyi na/ 
313b3('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis kyi khyab pa dang / dngos rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bun myed pa dang / smon tan gyi yod du phyid pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhi ga shegs
313b4('bum): ngag gyis kyang tshong bzung ba 'am/ mtha' ba no por myi san pos dang / lasangs kyi so dag gis / di sa zas ma khyod kyim 'di dag nyid tu don du
313b5('bum): dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don te/ gzhi ba dang / 'dun pa lnga ni dz+nyAn myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' bu ma yin no/ khyod kyis / 
313b6('bum): 'i the shes gnyen la shinang tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongs su zind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myong ba yang
313b7('bum): dog par rdzogs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol de to// bdag gis dge ba'i
314a1('bum): banalangs pa brgya mo/ bas ma bslong ma/ las lhag pa mang m-ig la 'a nan rdzogs shig ba ba'i ma bas da kyi ma b+h+yo sa kyi du ma so
314a2('bum): khams na/ gzugs dang sA dang / dI dgu ro dang / reg/ ste ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la skad cig gcig tsam gyi drin ldan yon ma
314a3('bum): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te// dbyas khas pa zos shing / shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa bong / 
314a4('bum): gas da sa mas sems na sa tu ni kyi rdza
314a5('bum): mangs nas kyang 'di sum du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byos/ pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ dre banon gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu 'a
314b1('bum): zhing myi dga' bar gyur to// yang 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba/ 
314b2('bum): rnams la lhag par bya ba byas te/ pa ste/ bdag yongs su 'dzind pa bdag gi dge ba'i za shes gnyen yin zhing / yun ring po nas de bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
314b3('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste/ nye bar phyi nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sem
314b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas
314b5('bum): 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems
314b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur sti bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye du r+ya 'am/ dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul lam/ sa la/ 
314b7('bum): sbrum dang / me tog dang / spos sam/ me tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la myed na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi
314b8('bum): drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am rangs pa 'amyi skye'o snyam du sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag da
315a1('bum): bla ma la gus par yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ rnamapar gyis shar phyogs su song ste/ grong khyer chen po shin tu sangs pa/ 'khyod drug rgyas pa/ dreb mo legs pa/ skye bo mang mo dang phyis yongs su/ 
315a2('bum): gang ba zhig tu phyind pa dang / de grong bar gi dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus bcings la de'i rin gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o// yun ring po nas/ 
315a3('bum): bdag gi lus stong zhig zad de dengs la btsongs te/ 'khor ba dpag tu myed pa nas 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang sa yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos
315a4('bum): kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar 'dug ste/ myi su 'dod myi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags
315a5('bum): shing skad kyis bo sa so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du/ sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
315a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'di 'dri bar 'a gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shes rab kyi
315a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / bas pa rgya mtsho yang thob par 'gyur la/ bdud dam bdud gi tshogs kyi lnga/ 
315a8('bum): rnams kyis myi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
315b1('bum): der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya/ 
315b2('bum): nas nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
315b3('bum): tu du mi su 'dod su zhig nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra myi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bar yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe/ bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs
315b4('bum): gcig tu song nas/ mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus/ btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha/ gas la bkur sti snyam na/ su lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ 
315b5('bum): ma bdag na rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus
315b6('bum): yongs su btang bar lhag par bsam pa phun gsum tshogs pa yin nam mo yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis gzhal bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i
315b7('bum): khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul dra nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
315b8('bum): kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid myi dgo' zhing gdung lo mche mi phyung ba ci nges/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ lus nye ba de kho bos ma rung na/ 
316a1('bum): de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
316a2('bum): dpa' chen po chos la phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
316a3('bum): kyi bu kho bo la myis ni bya ba med kyi/ kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der myi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang kho bo la dgos na de rin gyis nyor byin cig cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
316a4('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di la bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs pa rnyed do// bdag gi lus ni
316a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rnam/ sa la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/ sems dga' ba// dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u
316a6('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gong 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu / da rin ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes smras pa dang / des del 'di skad ces smras so/ 
316a7('bum): bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de khro bo la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu'i chen po rtag tu ngu mtshan rnon po thogs nas/ lag pa g.yes pa phug ste khrag gzugs so// brlagasas
316a8('bum): theg myed par btogs nas rus pa gcig tu rtsig pa'i drung dusang shing / de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo zhig tu khang pa'i yang tog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tu du tha ga myed par btogs nas
316b1('bum): rus pa gcog dutu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu ni'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na cha byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste/ dri'o snyam nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub seMs
316b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngug la ba der song ste phyinang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la'ang skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sti'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na changag byed/ khrag da
316b3('bum): rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
316b4('bum): chen po chos 'phags la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas tshong// dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi
316b5('bum): snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo rigs kyi bu de
316b6('bum): ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dgu stond par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par/ 
316b7('bum): sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gi kha dog lta bu yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 
316b8('bum): 'od zer mtha'ams pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang smos sa chen po dang / myi 'jigs pa ba ni dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi pon par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi
317a1('bum): nam 'dres pa bcwo rgyad kyang tho par tu 'gyur/ mngon pa shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa byasas gyis myi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab dung
317a2('bum): rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i yo shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gang gis sems
317a3('bum): can thams cad la kun tu 'go bko' bya ba bla na myed pa'i chos rin po che yang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tu rdul 'di skad ces smras so// bin
317a4('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskul pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na/ 
317a5('bum): gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher/ yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba'i
317a6('bum): gser dang / nor bu dang / 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye dur+ya 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ rme tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs
317a7('bum): sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod mo sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ga la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod
317a8('bum): dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byini bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad myi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub
317b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtag du phyi mdun du jug nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyong mi dam la gan pa ni legs so legs so// de lta bu'i chos 'dadapas sngon de bzhin gshen/ 
317b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang ston/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / babs mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par
317b3('bum): de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi blo kho bo la snying dang sha dang / khrag dag gis bya ba myed kyis/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs
317b4('bum): kyis rigs kyi bu khyod dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod/ dam pa ji lta bu sbyin par bya/ des de na la smras pa brgya byin// sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsold cig/ 
317b5('bum): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di ni kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan ngas rnams kyi yul tu gyu rod pa yin gyi/ dam pa gzhan slongs
317b6('bum): shi go/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'dri la lnga'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis
317b7('bum): rlabs bya'o// lce'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung
317b8('bum): bstand cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo' ba myed par mkhyend ce na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gyi lus bzhin du gyur cig ces bya ba dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas
318a1('bum): kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon bzhin du gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa myed par gyur
318a2('bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul lan glan pa'i spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
318a3('bum): po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ kho bo'i khyim ga la yod pa der 'dong ngo // kho mo pha ma las nar blangs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / byang
318a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya ba byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas
318a5('bum): rang gyi khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gyi khyim du phyi nad nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smraso yab yum gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / ma/ 
318a6('bum): tog dang / gdug pa dang / spros dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag bdag la stsol cig/ bdag
318a7('bum): kyang khyed kyis gsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
318a8('bum): chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de nas bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// 
318b1('bum): bam po// / de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems
318b2('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu du de su zhig bu mo rigs kyi bu de da lta gA na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta'o// skol gi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag
318b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las tha rad par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal pa'i slad du/ 
318b4('bum): bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bgyi bar 'i
318b5('bum): na/ de'i lus rkob su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde ba nas/ myi dgu' bar snyoms shing maN+Di ste/ des nga'i lus btsong bar 'dod na// lus nyo ba ma rnyed do
318b6('bum): sa pa du ba byin bram po'i khye'u'i gzugs su pa sbyo te/ del 'a snyed du rigs kyi bu byed grang gi phyi las sna ba' ces bgyis pa dang / sa sheso rab kyi du
318b7('bum): byed bral mamyong par bya ba dang / 'apogs pa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phrogs de la yod bkur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni dri 'i rig las pas 'di lta ste/ 
318b8('bum): rje ba'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / bram ze'i khyo 'u'i gzugs su bsgyur pas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ning myi 'dod de rang mchod sbyin zhig byed pa/ der mye'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / 
319a1('bum): ngag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu de yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs brla'i sha btogs te
319a2('bum): rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzag pa bdag khang pa'i ya'ang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ myi
319a3('bum): 'di ji'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad ces par gyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid gi lus kyi khrag gzugs pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis
319a4('bum): ba dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khra/ ga dang snying dang / rus pa dang rkang dang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ had nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang myed do// zhes mchi'o bdag
319a5('bum): gyis khyod la rin gyis ci zhig bya zhes bigyes pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
319a6('bum): chen po tshos 'phags la yang bkun stir bya'o zhes mchis nas/ bdug gis dril 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi nimo pa'am khyad par ci zhog 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'dis
319a7('bum): ngas rgyas kyi yon tan bas ma gyis sgro khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mos dpag tu skyed pa rnams rab tu sted par 'gyug/ 'di lta bu chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes sgom ste/ sangs rgyas
319a8('bum): min dadangams kyis skye khyab pa de dag bos nas/ bdag kyang dag ba dag 'ab tu mgrub chen po skyes nis 'disam byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spob pabyed ci ni shin du
319b1('bum): ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag la long spyod rgya chen po dag yod pa ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa myi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag
319b2('bum): la smon lam ci'i phyir myi gang bu snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdog nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub
319b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bgyid pa'i nor ma nga po dag bdag gis sbyin no// bdag nyid khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga
319b4('bum): ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yong su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa dag bdag gis thob par bgyi'o bgyis shing mchis na
319b5('bum): yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la sulang dug so lang/ bdag gyis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod
319b6('bum): par bgyi'o// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i rga ba'i gnas ngag khyod kyis bstanang pa lags na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ 'jig rten
319b7('bum): thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad byed ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de sgra bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro ba byed na/ khyed nged kyis gnang gis bu mo nged kyang khyod dong lhan cig tu
319b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro/ ngeng 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig/ de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya'o// 
320a1('bum): dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi blar chad myi bgyi'o// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan kyis brgyan cing / bu/ 
320a2('bum): mo lnga brgya de dag kyang brgyand kyis brgyan no// brgyand kyis brgyand nas/ me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / 
320a3('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag kyang thogs shing / gser dang / dngul ga me tog dag thogs shing rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas
320a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta cig tu bzhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya'i shing rta lnga brgya'i nang tu/ zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun tu bdar nas pha ma
320a5('bum): las stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ngo // de mthar kyis song ba dang / byang chub sems de pa'i sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rgyang ring po zhig nas/ grong khyer
320a6('bum): spros ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rab rim bdun gis yongs su bskor ba rtabs bdun yod pa/ 'obs ram bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun
320a7('bum): gyis yongasu bskor dra pa dang / chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byord cing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ myi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ gong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshung
320a8('bum): pa lnga brgya dag gyis ri mor mkhris pa bzhin du btags pa khyogs ri nyam myi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi gzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
320b1('bum): dpa chen po chos 'phags kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'dum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing/ mdun gyis smras nas/ chos da dbu mthong sa/ mthong ma pas/ 
320b2('bum): de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// ri mdzod nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i mdu
320b3('bum): zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba 'di ni bdag gi myi cha'o snyam nas/ shing rta de las bcas pa dang tshong dpon gyi bu ma~M dang / bu mo lnga brgyad dag dang ldan
320b4('bum): cig tu shing rta las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo las stsogs pa nang bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bde red/ bkod pa tshad myed
320b5('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha gas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
320b6('bum): pa'i khab du brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhag byed du btsug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur
320b7('bum): de dag snron ma'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir bdags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha'i snod tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyi/ a ka ru nag po 'ab zhig 'dug
320b8('bum): Ta tsun po 'i de'i dus kyi 'on kyi ma sna dun gyi khro bzhi btsugaso te/ de'i steng dri rin po che'i sbom po ni banaganos de'i na nas/ shes rab kyi tha mdo byiphyin pa gzing gi grags bam po rkye/ 
321a1('bum): r+ya zhugs bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de spyang dang gi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa ba dang pa 'phyang bas brgya nad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug tu ngu tshong dpon gyi nu mo/ 
321a2('bum): la stsogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad myed pas brgyand pa mthong zhing / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mun da ra ba dang / lha'i
321a3('bum): tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor mngon par 'bar/ mngon par rab tu nya thor ba mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan dag zlos so// mthong
321a4('bum): zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dadus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras s+ho// lha'i dag po khyod lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag rin po che'i khong bu brtsegs pa 'a
321a5('bum): ci'i phyir me tog man dar ba dang tsan cadan gyi phye ma dag gis 'byorazhing mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil sAn 'di dag kya rnams par snang dag la che'i phyir drung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i
321a6('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum/ 
321a7('bum): dang / yongs su 'drend pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems tshe dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyin
321a8('bum): kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod myi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
321b1('bum): phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'drend pa de gang na bzhugs// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegus bam la t+ye dur+ya
321b2('bum): bzhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgyu rim bdun gis btab nas bzhag ste/ kho bo cag gis khyod la bstan par byasla ba ma yin te/ de nyid stond pa mdzad do// de
321b3('bum): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya drug dang tshogs nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / gdug
321b4('bum): dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes ra
321b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti/ bya ba'i phyir cha shas kyis gzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dang
321b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang lhan cig tu me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ni bzu' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag
321b7('bum): la stsogs pas dang por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagos ga la ba der dong ste/ phyinang nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir
321b8('bum): chung sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / sIs dang / me dog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang tso
322a1('bum): gi phye ma dang gser dang dngul gi me tog dag gis gtong/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gto'o// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog/ 
322a2('bum): gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyurd to// gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal myed khang 'dra bar gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gi dkyil 'khor 'dra/ 
322a3('bum): bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gi bu mo la stsogs pa lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
322a4('bum): cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di ltar rdzu 'phru che zhing 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ ri/ 
322a5('bum): kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sem sa dpa' che spyod na yang rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra ba na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ 
322a6('bum): 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo las stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na
322a7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig bdag
322a8('bum): cog kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha gas kyis gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang byang chub ste// 
322b1('bum): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon gsum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la yang si lhar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du
322b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkur sti byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar stonod pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la stond par gyur cig/ ji ltar bya
322b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongasasu rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas
322b4('bum): pa dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzogs par shog shig ces smras so// de nas byangang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong nga dpon gi bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
322b5('bum): mchod pa byas 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo/ 
322b6('bum): bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhe sa dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
322b7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa tshol zhing 'breg dgon par phyind pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig shes rab kyi
322b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bdag gis skye de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su phyind nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi
323a1('bum): pha rol du phyind pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam mo// des bdag yid myi bde zhing shin du/ gdung bar gyud nas/ sang phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shi nang tu gdung
323a2('bum): bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gyi gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa 'bo' shig yid la bgyis te// ji srid cig tu bag+h+ri yo bar ma dang / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa 'di su las mnyan
323a3('bum): ba rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig byung ste/ 'di skad ces gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'od nas tshud lnga brgyar song / 
323a4('bum): dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
