323a5('bum): de las bdag gis thos nas ji ltar gdams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos stond pa mthong ste/ 
323a6('bum): mthong ma thog tu bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa ni dper na dge slong bas ma gtan dang po bzhugs pa bzhi na to/ bdag dga' ba dang / ra tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de las ma bskyong
323a7('bum): ra khyod las shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa thos so// de nyand pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
323a8('bum): 'das rnams kyi dbugs phyung ba mdzad do// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pa nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas
323b1('bum): da kyi 'phrul bar gyur ba bzhin gshegs pa dang sa sngon pa dang / bzhung pa bdag la nga drug yang du byin du pa stong drachu las rag tu nga na
323b2('bum): 'dun su 'o// des kyis smras pa dang/ rgyang chu ma su na ma pan po kyis byang chu ba sems dpa' sengs pa
323b3('bum): tshatshal pags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa nag tu dul 'disad ces smras so// lenas kyi bzhin ga shegs pa de dgan ga nas kyang khyod// dus ma bdud de zhin kyi
324a1('bum): las ma g.yos so ka de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de myi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa
324a2('bum): mtha' la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'om 'gro ba myed de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs dang
324a3('bum): rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin 'gro ba 'askyed de/ ri lta ba 'inan pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba la thong ba 'am 'gro ba skyed de/ 'dod chags dang bral
324a4('bum): bgra yon pa de ni de bzhin gzigs ky-i rigs kyi // ga bra la 'ong ba 'am 'grob myed de/ 'grog pa ga yin/ den de bzhin ga shegs pan// rigs kyi su rnam ma kha'i ma
324a5('bum): ba ma rjo skye sa dunams sas ngan gas ba dang da da myed smra sa de ga na
324a6('bum): ban dag sbyin po sa de ga ses pa bzhin gang 'di badzin de na ga gas pa pa na nyid na sa
324b1('bum): kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can// shes rab 'chal pa'i
324b2('bum): rang bzhin can gis spyi ngag rgyu mthong nas chur ma mchis po la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te
324b3('bum): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgra mngon par zhend par byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byond pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin gshegs
324b4('bum): pa lo byond pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byi rnas pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes brjod par bya ste/ dper na mi de chu myed pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa de
324b5('bum): bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugasas gyi skar myi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ rigs kyi
324b6('bum): bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byond pa dang bzhud pa myong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma sprul da pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung
324b7('bum): rlung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang byon pa 'am bzhud pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmyi
324b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig mthong ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'im/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu'am/ na bcu'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya ma/ demaso lhags
325a1('bum): zhig ma bong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa cig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang
325a2('bum): du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam na la chos gang yang grub pa myi gda'o// rmi lam ni brdzun de yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ de de bzhin te/ chos thas cad ni de bzhin
325a3('bum): gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstind pa myi shes pa de dag ni mying mtshan gi/ 
325a4('bum): sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon pa nye zhe nad pa byed de/ de chos nyi da mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byond pa dang bzhud pa par rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhun/ 
325a5('bum): par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba/ 'gro ba drug par song ba dang dong ba dang / dong bar 'gyur ba'o// da dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa las
325a6('bum): rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rmi/ 
325a7('bum): lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba'i 'gag par myi rtog go// gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skye bo
325a8('bum): 'am 'gag par myi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rab tu shes so/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byond pa dang bzhud par myi rtog go// 
325b1('bum): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gyur pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// 
325b2('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten gi sbyin gnas so/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na ri
325b3('bum): po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'das mod kyi/ sems can drag gi ngag gi
325b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po tshe dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu myed pa'i 'byung ba ma yin gyi rgyu dang rkyend dang gzhi rag las pa yin te// brten nas/ 
325b5('bum): byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang myi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyend de dag yod na rin// po che dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyend de dag myed na rin po che
325b6('bum): de dag rab tu dbye ba yang myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi skur mngon par grub pa yang gi nga nas kyang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhun
325b7('bum): do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu myed pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongasu grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyend la rag las pa sngon gyi 'phri ni las rnam par smind pa'i rgyu las byung ba
325b8('bum): yin no// de dag kyang rkyend rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na skra mngon par 'grub par yang myi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pi bang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang
326a1('bum): ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa yang gang du yang myi 'gro gang du yang myi 'ong ste/ brten nas byung ba rgyu la rag las pa rkyend la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste pi bang gi khog pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu/ 
326a2('bum): la brten/ rgyud rten la rten/ myi de las skyes pa'i rtse bo las brtan pa/ brten nas byung ba rgyu la rag las pa rkyend la rag las pi bang de las sgra 'byung ste/ de yang ba bang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags
326a3('bum): pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / myi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgra grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa
326a4('bum): yang gang tu yang myi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyend la rag las pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas
326a5('bum): yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtse ba gcig gis sangs kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu myed pas yang ma yin no// 
326a6('bum): rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de dag gang nas kyang ma byon te/ rgyud rkyen tshogs pa yang myed b+ha gang du yang myi bzhud do// tshogs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon
326a7('bum): dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos med kyang / khyod kyis de bzhin du khong du chud par byos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tsun chad de ltar de bzhin ga shegs pa dang chos thams cad/ 
326a8('bum): skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha ri mang tu phyind pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur
326b1('bum): sbyi sa sa du nas bye ga sa gso chen po gsos pa rdzu sa/ gsu nywa chen pa ga kyilam spyad ma rgyu tug

326b3('bum): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su btud
326b4('bum): gyur to// dus mu yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gri bar snang la da 'thor zhing me tog gi char dag kyang 'thob bo/ lha'i dbang po ba rgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa
326b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul ldi'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing chi/ go 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gyis
326b6('bum): kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstand pa thos so zhes 'dzer to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
326b7('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ rkyend gang lags/ chos
326b8('bum): 'thags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byon pa myi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstand pas srog chags brgyad stong myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
327a1('bum): dang / khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par
327a2('bum): gyur pa'i phyir ro hade nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
327a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhudu pa med pa bstand pa 'di des pas sems can ji snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang
327a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par bya ba'i dge bo mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la pha'i the tsom myi za'o// bdag ni the tsom myed par de bzhin gshegaso pa dag
327a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam/ pa dang / de dga' bya dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas twa la bdun/ tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug
327a6('bum): ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bku re stir bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis byang chub sems dpa'
327a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog ma dor ba dag byind te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'od dag gis byang chungab sems dpa/ 
327a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir gyis shig/ 'di na khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can
327b1('bum): khams cad kyi phyin ji ltar khyod sngobar byed pa de de lta bur bskal dpa grangs myed par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni du ba dud cu'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chung sems da sems pa me po/ 
327b2('bum): tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub
327b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng sran cad khyod kyi rim 'gro dang zhab 'breng bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod
327b4('bum): dbul lo// des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen pos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo dang 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub
327b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdu la 'di skad ces smras/ rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyos/ khang nyeg cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ches de dag thob par gyur
327b6('bum): cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyis pa dang / de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi' 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems// 
327b7('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo las sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed cag kho bo la lhag bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyed kha bis blang ngo // bu me de dag gi/ 
327b8('bum): smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dod par bya/ ba bdag nyid la dbul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe/ 
328a1('bum): po rtag tu dus tshong dpon gis bu lnga stsogs pa Shabu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyand te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
328a2('bum): 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su spro longs spyod pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu dri la legaso
328a3('bum): zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gos bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bur m+b+ha/ 
328a4('bum): du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes ra rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus / 
328a5('bum): sngon gyi ro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs// par sangs rgyas de dag kyang sngon byang chub sems dpe'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas na steng / bla na myed pas
328a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags
328a7('bum): kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo las sregs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ khAng tam nas
328a8('bum): rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu de nyid la slar byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen de chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdago ga khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub por gyur to// de nas byang chub
328b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'os la 'dug pa'am/ nyas pa byed pa ni myi ma la 'drini ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems 'i de seM rdzun
328b2('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos stond du phyir ma byung gi bir tu bdag 'greng ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje chen po rnom
328b3('bum): 'phags lo bdun gi bar tu ting nge 'dzind gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind gangs myed dpag tumed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dag 'bu
328b4('bum): la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gi bar tu 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par
328b5('bum): 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / ro la rngam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldeng bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub semyas dpa' sems dag
328b6('bum): chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dus nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams nas/ bdag gis sa phyogs kyi 'di chag chag legs par btab pa dang / legs par byugs la sa
328b7('bum): tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu stond par 'gyur ba der legs par 'byung
328b8('bum): bar bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad
329a1('bum): ba kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lnga'i sgra de thongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagrus zhag 'dun na
329a2('bum): 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos stonang par 'gyur ro zhes grag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lA'i sgra de bos pa dang / dag
329a3('bum): ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid 'angs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad/ 
329a4('bum): kyis smras pa po shams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi ga dgos phung de bstan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos stond par 'gyur ba de/ 
329a5('bum): bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de tshig chag gdab na par 'dod na/ bdud sdig cegis chu thams cad myi snang bar byas nas ci nas byang chub seMs/ 
329a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mu ma red nas yid myi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / michod pa de yang myi mangs par bya / 
329a7('bum): phyir mu de dag myi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na mus red do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag khrig gis sa phyogs
329a8('bum): 'di cog chag god pas rgya'o// de ci'i phyi zhin/ sa phyogs 'dzin dul ma/ dus gyi khams 'didas byungabs byang chubasems pa'i sengs ma po tsha kyi ga kyi ma la thog
329b1('bum): bdag gi lus gdon myi ze dar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig ni bla'i/ nus pa myed pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus
329b2('bum): brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi
329b3('bum): khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad/ 
329b4('bum): kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis su phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag dal bdud sdig can gyis dge blar chad bya ba'i grags rnyed par
329b5('bum): 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ dang / bu ma de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba myed do// de nas/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' so/ 
329b6('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang 'di ltar yi dam la brton pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang / longs spyod rnams la myi lta ba dang / bla na mying po yang dag par rdzogs
329b7('bum): pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa las sems can 'ar par bya'o// snyam du lhag pa'i/ 
329b8('bum): bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar te snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i can dan gi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgyam ba bsam gyis
330a1('bum): myi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab po// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// 
330a2('bum): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis myi khyab po// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na myed pa'o// rigs kyi bu sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
330a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas
330a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu 'di snyam du sem/ das/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
330a5('bum): 'phags kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
330a6('bum): chen po chos 'phrugs chos 'chang pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul cing
330a7('bum): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lnga'i me tog man da ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos stom
330a8('bum): cing / seng ge'i khri l-i 'u du shrI pA la yang gtor cig ces de la me tog khal sdang byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus ma tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cog gis
330b1('bum): phyogs der bkram pa byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das
330b2('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzind de las langs te/ chos 'phags kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha
330b3('bum): rolang tu phyind pa stond to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthog catu 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs
330b4('bum): pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba thob de lta bu thob bo da de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa 'di lta ste/ chos thos
330b5('bum): cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nad pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba skyed pa nyid ba
330b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa g.yo' ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rlom sems myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa myed pa nyid pas/ 
330b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
330b8('bum): mu myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad skyo ba myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rosad tu phyind pa skye ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa 'gag pa myed pa stod / 
331a1('bum): nam mkha' mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid
331a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha'a'i rtog pa myed po nyid las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa myed pa nyi da// gzugs mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes
331a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa/ mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// 
331a4('bum): sa'i khams mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams pa mye'i khams dang / rlung gyi khams su myed pa nyid pos/ shes
331a5('bum): rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa su myed pa nyid do// nas ma kho'i khams mo myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid
331a6('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'ongs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'das pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmyigs su med pa
331a7('bum): nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam por 'jig po ma nyi
331a8('bum): pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam pa gis myi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu
331b1('bum): byin pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug tu ngus de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
331b2('bum): thob byar gyur to// chos thams cad dben zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad rlom pa mye sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
331b3('bum): dang / chos thams cad khengs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos
331b4('bum): thams cad skye ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du dang / nam mkha' tha myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes
331b5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / r-i rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin dang // ma mkha' rtog pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzugs myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 
331b6('bum): tshorna ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sa'i khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / 
331b7('bum): rlung gi khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
331b8('bum): 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa myed pa zhes bya
332a1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de dag las stsogs pa/ 
332a2('bum): ting ste 'dzin gyi sgo 'buM phrag drug bcu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ 
332a3('bum): bdun bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gi sgo 'bru
332a4('bum): phrag drug bcu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang 1nub phyogs dang // / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khwa
332a5('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klu gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gi sa yongs su bskord cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis

332a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos stonang pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab
332a8('bum): kyi pha ljid tu phyind pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gang skyes pa thams cad du yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/

332b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ byang dag por long sa su b.rung por byar/ kyi pa'i lung tu phyin nga / ros sbyin zhen/ kun nub
332b6('bum): skyes shig/ gzhan la rgya che yang dag par stond cig/ kun dag 'a za shes rab kyi pa ri la tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ni/ ngag gis mnyen par bya/ gzung ba ga
332b7('bum): bcang bar bya/ zakra par bya/ kun chu par bya/ 'don par bya/ lung nad par bya/ bstan pa bya/ kha don du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ rdzogs pas med po sa mi dgas pa ni
332b8('bum): rab tu gsal bar legs par bris te/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ru yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod
333a1('bum): num pa mang pos bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor b+ha/ mchod par bya/ rnyed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstanang pa'o// de ci'i phyir
333a2('bum): zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi stond pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi stonod pa lags so// bde
333a3('bum): bar gshegs pa bdag gi sto nad pa lags so// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun
333a4('bum): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi stonang pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi sa byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du'ong
333a5('bum): ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim 'gru/ byos so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na da ltar bzhugs te/ zhing ba zhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis 'phangs pa dang / dad pa
333a6('bum): dang / gus pa byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ji nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di nub par myi 'gyur zhing / ji nas
333a7('bum): khyod skyes bu ba mor myi 'gyur bar khyod la/ lan gnyis/ lan gsum du yongs su gdod do// rjes su yongs su gtad do// kun dag 'gro/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
333a8('bum): pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun da ga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin chos stond par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang
333b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di/ nyand pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston
333b2('bum): ba dang kha bon byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs
333b3('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ 
333b4('bum): mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyand pa dang / ma bral
333b5('bum): ba dang / dge 'dun la ri mor byed pa dang ma bral ba rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du spyad par bya'o// bcom
333b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces paka sum nas nub sems da sems dpalabyams stsogs pa dang
333b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pasha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa/ kun dga' bo da
333b8('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin dang dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa
334a1('bum): oM@##par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag
334a2('bum): rtsa bdun pa'o// / bam po rtsa sum brgya rtsa gsum pa'o// 
334a3('bum): pra ti bcu sa// shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ stong phrag du rgyu'o// phyo/ sa bcum pa
334a4('bum): yas pa mu myed pa'i 'jig rtenang gi khams rgya mtsho'i mthas gtu/ gas pa'i
